001package arez.processor;
002
003import com.squareup.javapoet.ParameterizedTypeName;
004import com.squareup.javapoet.TypeName;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Arrays;
008import java.util.Collection;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.HashMap;
011import java.util.HashSet;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Objects;
015import java.util.Set;
016import java.util.function.Function;
017import java.util.regex.Matcher;
018import java.util.regex.Pattern;
019import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
020import javax.annotation.Nullable;
021import javax.annotation.processing.ProcessingEnvironment;
022import javax.annotation.processing.RoundEnvironment;
023import javax.annotation.processing.SupportedAnnotationTypes;
024import javax.annotation.processing.SupportedOptions;
025import javax.annotation.processing.SupportedSourceVersion;
026import javax.lang.model.SourceVersion;
027import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
028import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationValue;
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
031import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
032import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
033import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
034import javax.lang.model.element.VariableElement;
035import javax.lang.model.type.DeclaredType;
036import javax.lang.model.type.ExecutableType;
037import javax.lang.model.type.TypeKind;
038import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
039import javax.lang.model.util.Elements;
040import javax.lang.model.util.Types;
041import javax.tools.Diagnostic;
042import org.realityforge.proton.AbstractStandardProcessor;
043import org.realityforge.proton.AnnotationsUtil;
044import org.realityforge.proton.DeferredElementSet;
045import org.realityforge.proton.ElementsUtil;
046import org.realityforge.proton.MemberChecks;
047import org.realityforge.proton.ProcessorException;
048import org.realityforge.proton.StopWatch;
049import org.realityforge.proton.SuperficialValidation;
050import org.realityforge.proton.TypesUtil;
051import static javax.tools.Diagnostic.Kind.*;

053/**
054 * Annotation processor that analyzes Arez annotated source and generates models from the annotations.
055 */
056@SupportedAnnotationTypes( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME )
057@SupportedSourceVersion( SourceVersion.RELEASE_17 )
058@SupportedOptions( { "arez.defer.unresolved",
059                     "arez.defer.errors",
060                     "arez.debug",
061                     "arez.profile",
062                     "arez.verbose_out_of_round" } )
063public final class ArezProcessor
064  extends AbstractStandardProcessor
065{
066  static final Pattern GETTER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^get([A-Z].*)$" );
067  private static final Pattern ON_ACTIVATE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^on([A-Z].*)Activate$" );
068  private static final Pattern ON_DEACTIVATE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^on([A-Z].*)Deactivate$" );
069  private static final Pattern SETTER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^set([A-Z].*)$" );
070  private static final Pattern ISSER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^is([A-Z].*)$" );
071  @Nonnull
072  private static final List<String> OBJECT_METHODS =
073    Arrays.asList( "hashCode", "equals", "clone", "toString", "finalize", "getClass", "wait", "notifyAll", "notify" );
074  private static final List<String> AREZ_SPECIAL_METHODS =
075    Arrays.asList( "observe", "dispose", "isDisposed", "getArezId" );
076  private static final Pattern ID_GETTER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^get([A-Z].*)Id$" );
077  private static final Pattern RAW_ID_GETTER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^(.*)Id$" );
078  private static final Pattern OBSERVABLE_REF_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^get([A-Z].*)ObservableValue$" );
079  private static final Pattern COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^get([A-Z].*)ComputableValue$" );
080  private static final Pattern OBSERVER_REF_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^get([A-Z].*)Observer$" );
081  private static final Pattern ON_DEPS_CHANGE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^on([A-Z].*)DepsChange" );
082  private static final Pattern PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^pre([A-Z].*)Remove" );
083  private static final Pattern POST_INVERSE_ADD_PATTERN = Pattern.compile( "^post([A-Z].*)Add" );
084  @Nonnull
085  private final DeferredElementSet _deferredTypes = new DeferredElementSet();
086  @Nonnull
087  private final StopWatch _analyzeComponentStopWatch = new StopWatch( "Analyze Component" );
088
089  @Override
090  @Nonnull
091  protected String getIssueTrackerURL()
092  {
093    return "https://github.com/arez/arez/issues";
094  }
095
096  @Nonnull
097  @Override
098  protected String getOptionPrefix()
099  {
100    return "arez";
101  }
102
103  @Override
104  protected void collectStopWatches( @Nonnull final Collection<StopWatch> stopWatches )
105  {
106    stopWatches.add( _analyzeComponentStopWatch );
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public boolean process( @Nonnull final Set<? extends TypeElement> annotations, @Nonnull final RoundEnvironment env )
111  {
112    debugAnnotationProcessingRootElements( env );
113    collectRootTypeNames( env );
114    processTypeElements( annotations,
115                         env,
116                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
117                         _deferredTypes,
118                         _analyzeComponentStopWatch.getName(),
119                         this::process,
120                         _analyzeComponentStopWatch );
121    errorIfProcessingOverAndInvalidTypesDetected( env );
122    clearRootTypeNamesIfProcessingOver( env );
123    return true;
124  }
125
126  private void process( @Nonnull final TypeElement element )
127    throws IOException, ProcessorException
128  {
129    final ComponentDescriptor descriptor = parse( element );
130    emitTypeSpec( descriptor.getPackageName(), ComponentGenerator.buildType( processingEnv, descriptor ) );
131  }
132
133  @Nonnull
134  private ObservableDescriptor addObservable( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
135                                              @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
136                                              @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
137                                              @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
138    throws ProcessorException
139  {
140    MemberChecks.mustBeOverridable( component.getElement(),
141                                    Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
142                                    Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
143                                    method );
144
145    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
146    final boolean expectSetter = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "expectSetter" );
147    final VariableElement readOutsideTransaction =
148      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "readOutsideTransaction" );
149    final VariableElement writeOutsideTransaction =
150      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "writeOutsideTransaction" );
151    final boolean setterAlwaysMutates = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "setterAlwaysMutates" );
152    final Boolean requireInitializer = isInitializerRequired( method );
153
154    final TypeMirror returnType = method.getReturnType();
155    final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
156    String name;
157    final boolean setter;
158    if ( TypeKind.VOID == returnType.getKind() )
159    {
160      setter = true;
161      //Should be a setter
162      if ( 1 != method.getParameters().size() )
163      {
164        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target should be a setter or getter", method );
165      }
166
167      name = deriveName( method, SETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
168      if ( null == name )
169      {
170        name = methodName;
171      }
172    }
173    else
174    {
175      setter = false;
176      //Must be a getter
177      if ( 0 != method.getParameters().size() )
178      {
179        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target should be a setter or getter", method );
180      }
181      name = getPropertyAccessorName( method, declaredName );
182    }
183    // Override name if supplied by user
184    if ( !Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
185    {
186      name = declaredName;
187      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
188      {
189        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
190                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
191      }
192      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
193      {
194        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
195                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
196      }
197    }
198    checkNameUnique( component, name, method, Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME );
199
200    if ( setter && !expectSetter )
201    {
202      throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @Observable is a setter but defines " +
203                                    "expectSetter = false for observable named " + name, method );
204    }
205
206    final ObservableDescriptor observable = component.findOrCreateObservable( name );
207    observable.setReadOutsideTransaction( readOutsideTransaction.getSimpleName().toString() );
208    observable.setWriteOutsideTransaction( writeOutsideTransaction.getSimpleName().toString() );
209    if ( !setterAlwaysMutates )
210    {
211      observable.setSetterAlwaysMutates( false );
212    }
213    if ( !expectSetter )
214    {
215      observable.setExpectSetter( false );
216    }
217    if ( !observable.expectSetter() )
218    {
219      if ( observable.hasSetter() )
220      {
221        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @Observable defines expectSetter = false but a " +
222                                      "setter exists named " + observable.getSetter().getSimpleName() +
223                                      "for observable named " + name, method );
224      }
225    }
226    if ( setter )
227    {
228      if ( observable.hasSetter() )
229      {
230        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @Observable defines duplicate setter for " +
231                                      "observable named " + name, method );
232      }
233      if ( !observable.expectSetter() )
234      {
235        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @Observable defines expectSetter = false but a " +
236                                      "setter exists for observable named " + name, method );
237      }
238      observable.setSetter( method, methodType );
239    }
240    else
241    {
242      if ( observable.hasGetter() )
243      {
244        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @Observable defines duplicate getter for " +
245                                      "observable named " + name, method );
246      }
247      observable.setGetter( method, methodType );
248    }
249    if ( null != requireInitializer )
250    {
251      if ( !method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
252      {
253        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target set initializer parameter to ENABLED but " +
254                                      "method is not abstract.", method );
255      }
256      final Boolean existing = observable.getInitializer();
257      if ( null == existing )
258      {
259        observable.setInitializer( requireInitializer );
260      }
261      else if ( existing != requireInitializer )
262      {
263        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target set initializer parameter to value that differs from " +
264                                      "the paired observable method.", method );
265      }
266    }
267    return observable;
268  }
269
270  private void addObservableValueRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
271                                      @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
272                                      @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
273                                      @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
274    throws ProcessorException
275  {
276    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
277                             component,
278                             method,
279                             Constants.OBSERVABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
280
281    final TypeMirror returnType = methodType.getReturnType();
282    if ( TypeKind.DECLARED != returnType.getKind() ||
283         !ElementsUtil.toRawType( returnType ).toString().equals( "arez.ObservableValue" ) )
284    {
285      throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @ObservableValueRef must return an instance of " +
286                                    "arez.ObservableValue", method );
287    }
288
289    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
290    final String name;
291    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
292    {
293      name = deriveName( method, OBSERVABLE_REF_PATTERN, declaredName );
294      if ( null == name )
295      {
296        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @ObservableValueRef should specify name or be " +
297                                      "named according to the convention get[Name]ObservableValue", method );
298      }
299    }
300    else
301    {
302      name = declaredName;
303      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
304      {
305        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObservableValueRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
306                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
307      }
308      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
309      {
310        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObservableValueRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
311                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
312      }
313    }
314
315    component.findOrCreateObservable( name ).addRefMethod( method, methodType );
316  }
317
318  private void addComputableValueRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
319                                      @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
320                                      @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
321                                      @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
322    throws ProcessorException
323  {
324    mustBeRefMethod( component, method, Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
325    shouldBeInternalRefMethod( processingEnv,
326                               component,
327                               method,
328                               Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
329
330    final TypeMirror returnType = methodType.getReturnType();
331    if ( TypeKind.DECLARED != returnType.getKind() ||
332         !ElementsUtil.toRawType( returnType ).toString().equals( "arez.ComputableValue" ) )
333    {
334      throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @ComputableValueRef must return an instance of " +
335                                    "arez.ComputableValue", method );
336    }
337
338    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
339    final String name;
340    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
341    {
342      name = deriveName( method, COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_PATTERN, declaredName );
343      if ( null == name )
344      {
345        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @ComputableValueRef should specify name or be " +
346                                      "named according to the convention get[Name]ComputableValue", method );
347      }
348    }
349    else
350    {
351      name = declaredName;
352      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
353      {
354        throw new ProcessorException( "@ComputableValueRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
355                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
356      }
357      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
358      {
359        throw new ProcessorException( "@ComputableValueRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
360                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
361      }
362    }
363
364    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
365                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
366                                         Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME,
367                                         method );
368    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME, method );
369    component.findOrCreateMemoize( name ).addRefMethod( method, methodType );
370  }
371
372  @Nonnull
373  private String deriveMemoizeName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
374                                    @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
375    throws ProcessorException
376  {
377    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
378    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
379    {
380      return getPropertyAccessorName( method, name );
381    }
382    else
383    {
384      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
385      {
386        throw new ProcessorException( "@Memoize target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
387                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
388      }
389      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
390      {
391        throw new ProcessorException( "@Memoize target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
392                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
393      }
394      return name;
395    }
396  }
397
398  private void addOnActivate( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
399                              @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
400                              @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
401    throws ProcessorException
402  {
403    final String name = deriveHookName( component, method,
404                                        ON_ACTIVATE_PATTERN,
405                                        "Activate",
406                                        AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" ) );
407    MemberChecks.mustNotBeAbstract( Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME, method );
408    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
409                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
410                                         Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME,
411                                         method );
412    final List<? extends VariableElement> parameters = method.getParameters();
413
414    if (
415      !(
416        parameters.isEmpty() ||
417        ( 1 == parameters.size() &&
418          Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_CLASSNAME.equals( ElementsUtil.toRawType( parameters.get( 0 ).asType() )
419                                                         .toString() ) )
420      )
421    )
422    {
423      throw new ProcessorException( "@OnActivate target must not have any parameters or must have a single " +
424                                    "parameter of type arez.ComputableValue", method );
425    }
426
427    MemberChecks.mustNotReturnAnyValue( Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME, method );
428    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME, method );
429    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
430                                component,
431                                method,
432                                Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
433
434    component.findOrCreateMemoize( name ).setOnActivate( method );
435  }
436
437  private void addOnDeactivate( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
438                                @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
439                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
440    throws ProcessorException
441  {
442    final String name =
443      deriveHookName( component, method,
444                      ON_DEACTIVATE_PATTERN,
445                      "Deactivate",
446                      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" ) );
447    MemberChecks.mustBeLifecycleHook( component.getElement(),
448                                      Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
449                                      Constants.ON_DEACTIVATE_CLASSNAME,
450                                      method );
451    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
452                                component,
453                                method,
454                                Constants.ON_DEACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
455    component.findOrCreateMemoize( name ).setOnDeactivate( method );
456  }
457
458  @Nonnull
459  private String deriveHookName( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
460                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
461                                 @Nonnull final Pattern pattern,
462                                 @Nonnull final String type,
463                                 @Nonnull final String name )
464    throws ProcessorException
465  {
466    final String value = deriveName( method, pattern, name );
467    if ( null == value )
468    {
469      throw new ProcessorException( "Unable to derive name for @On" + type + " as does not match " +
470                                    "on[Name]" + type + " pattern. Please specify name.", method );
471    }
472    else if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( value ) )
473    {
474      throw new ProcessorException( "@On" + type + " target specified an invalid name '" + value + "'. The " +
475                                    "name must be a valid java identifier.", component.getElement() );
476    }
477    else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( value ) )
478    {
479      throw new ProcessorException( "@On" + type + " target specified an invalid name '" + value + "'. The " +
480                                    "name must not be a java keyword.", component.getElement() );
481    }
482    else
483    {
484      return value;
485    }
486  }
487
488  private void addComponentStateRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
489                                     @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
490                                     @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
491    throws ProcessorException
492  {
493    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
494                             component,
495                             method,
496                             Constants.COMPONENT_STATE_REF_CLASSNAME );
497
498    final TypeMirror returnType = method.getReturnType();
499    if ( TypeKind.BOOLEAN != returnType.getKind() )
500    {
501      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentStateRef target must return a boolean", method );
502    }
503    final VariableElement variableElement = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "value" );
504    final ComponentStateRefDescriptor.State state =
505      ComponentStateRefDescriptor.State.valueOf( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() );
506
507    component.getComponentStateRefs().add( new ComponentStateRefDescriptor( method, state ) );
508  }
509
510  private void addContextRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component, @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
511    throws ProcessorException
512  {
513    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
514                             component,
515                             method,
516                             Constants.CONTEXT_REF_CLASSNAME );
517    MemberChecks.mustReturnAnInstanceOf( processingEnv,
518                                         method,
519                                         Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME,
520                                         "arez.ArezContext" );
521    component.getContextRefs().add( method );
522  }
523
524  private void addComponentIdRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
525                                  @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
526  {
527    mustBeRefMethod( component, method, Constants.COMPONENT_ID_REF_CLASSNAME );
528    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.COMPONENT_ID_REF_CLASSNAME, method );
529    component.getComponentIdRefs().add( method );
530  }
531
532  private void addComponentRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component, @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
533    throws ProcessorException
534  {
535    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
536                             component,
537                             method,
538                             Constants.COMPONENT_REF_CLASSNAME );
539    MemberChecks.mustReturnAnInstanceOf( processingEnv,
540                                         method,
541                                         Constants.COMPONENT_REF_CLASSNAME,
542                                         "arez.Component" );
543    component.getComponentRefs().add( method );
544  }
545
546  private void setComponentId( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
547                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement componentId,
548                               @Nonnull final ExecutableType componentIdMethodType )
549    throws ProcessorException
550  {
551    MemberChecks.mustNotBeAbstract( Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME, componentId );
552    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
553                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
554                                         Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME,
555                                         componentId );
556    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME, componentId );
557    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME, componentId );
558    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME, componentId );
559
560    if ( null != component.getComponentId() )
561    {
562      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentId target duplicates existing method named " +
563                                    component.getComponentId().getSimpleName(), componentId );
564    }
565    else
566    {
567      component.setComponentId( Objects.requireNonNull( componentId ) );
568      component.setComponentIdMethodType( componentIdMethodType );
569    }
570  }
571
572  private void setComponentTypeNameRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
573                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
574    throws ProcessorException
575  {
576    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
577                             component,
578                             method,
579                             Constants.COMPONENT_TYPE_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME );
580    MemberChecks.mustReturnAnInstanceOf( processingEnv,
581                                         method,
582                                         Constants.COMPONENT_TYPE_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME,
583                                         String.class.getName() );
584    component.getComponentTypeNameRefs().add( method );
585  }

602  private void addPostConstruct( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component, @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
603    throws ProcessorException
604  {
605    MemberChecks.mustBeLifecycleHook( component.getElement(),
606                                      Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
607                                      Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME,
608                                      method );
609    shouldBeInternalLifecycleMethod( processingEnv,
610                                     component,
611                                     method,
612                                     Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME );
613    component.getPostConstructs().add( method );
614  }

628  }

630  private void addPostDispose( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component, @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
631    throws ProcessorException

641    component.getPostDisposes().add( method );
642  }
643
644  private void linkUnAnnotatedObservables( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
645                                           @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> getters,
646                                           @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> setters )
647    throws ProcessorException
648  {
649    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : component.getObservables().values() )
650    {
651      if ( !observable.hasSetter() && !observable.hasGetter() )
652      {
653        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObservableValueRef target unable to be associated with an " +
654                                      "Observable property", observable.getRefMethods().get( 0 ).getMethod() );
655      }
656      else if ( !observable.hasSetter() && observable.expectSetter() )
657      {
658        final CandidateMethod candidate = setters.remove( observable.getName() );
659        if ( null != candidate )
660        {
661          MemberChecks.mustBeOverridable( component.getElement(),
662                                          Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
663                                          Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
664                                          candidate.getMethod() );
665          observable.setSetter( candidate.getMethod(), candidate.getMethodType() );
666        }
667        else if ( observable.hasGetter() )
668        {
669          throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target defined getter but no setter was defined and no " +
670                                        "setter could be automatically determined", observable.getGetter() );
671        }
672      }
673      else if ( !observable.hasGetter() )
674      {
675        final CandidateMethod candidate = getters.remove( observable.getName() );
676        if ( null != candidate )
677        {
678          MemberChecks.mustBeOverridable( component.getElement(),
679                                          Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
680                                          Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
681                                          candidate.getMethod() );
682          observable.setGetter( candidate.getMethod(), candidate.getMethodType() );
683        }
684        else
685        {
686          throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable target defined setter but no getter was defined and no " +
687                                        "getter could be automatically determined", observable.getSetter() );
688        }
689      }
690    }
691
692    // Find pairs of un-annotated abstract setter/getter pairs and treat them as if they
693    // are annotated with @Observable
694    for ( final Map.Entry<String, CandidateMethod> entry : new ArrayList<>( getters.entrySet() ) )
695    {
696      final CandidateMethod getter = entry.getValue();
697      if ( getter.getMethod().getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
698      {
699        final String name = entry.getKey();
700        final CandidateMethod setter = setters.remove( name );
701        if ( null != setter && setter.getMethod().getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
702        {
703          final ObservableDescriptor observable = component.findOrCreateObservable( name );
704          observable.setGetter( getter.getMethod(), getter.getMethodType() );
705          observable.setSetter( setter.getMethod(), setter.getMethodType() );
706          getters.remove( name );
707        }
708      }
709    }
710  }
711
712  private void linkUnAnnotatedObserves( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
713                                        @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> observes,
714                                        @Nonnull final Map<String, CandidateMethod> onDepsChanges )
715    throws ProcessorException
716  {
717    for ( final ObserveDescriptor observe : component.getObserves().values() )
718    {
719      if ( !observe.hasObserve() )
720      {
721        final CandidateMethod candidate = observes.remove( observe.getName() );
722        if ( null != candidate )
723        {
724          observe.setObserveMethod( false,
725                                    Priority.NORMAL,
726                                    true,
727                                    true,
728                                    true,
729                                    "AREZ",
730                                    false,
731                                    false,
732                                    candidate.getMethod(),
733                                    candidate.getMethodType() );
734        }
735        else
736        {
737          throw new ProcessorException( "@OnDepsChange target has no corresponding @Observe that could " +
738                                        "be automatically determined", observe.getOnDepsChange() );
739        }
740      }
741      else if ( !observe.hasOnDepsChange() )
742      {
743        final CandidateMethod candidate = onDepsChanges.remove( observe.getName() );
744        if ( null != candidate )
745        {
746          setOnDepsChange( component, observe, candidate.getMethod() );
747        }
748      }
749    }
750  }
751
752  private void setOnDepsChange( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
753                                @Nonnull final ObserveDescriptor observe,
754                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
755  {
756    MemberChecks.mustNotBeAbstract( Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME, method );
757    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
758                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
759                                         Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME,
760                                         method );
761    final List<? extends VariableElement> parameters = method.getParameters();
762    if (
763      !(
764        parameters.isEmpty() ||
765        ( 1 == parameters.size() && Constants.OBSERVER_CLASSNAME.equals( parameters.get( 0 ).asType().toString() ) )
766      )
767    )
768    {
769      throw new ProcessorException( "@OnDepsChange target must not have any parameters or must have a single " +
770                                    "parameter of type arez.Observer", method );
771    }
772
773    MemberChecks.mustNotReturnAnyValue( Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME, method );
774    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME, method );
775    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
776                                component,
777                                method,
778                                Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME );
779    observe.setOnDepsChange( method );
780  }
781
782  private void verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
783    throws ProcessorException
784  {
785    final List<String> annotations =
786      Arrays.asList( Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME,
787                     Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME,
788                     Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME,
789                     Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME,
790                     Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
791                     Constants.OBSERVABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME,
792                     Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME,
793                     Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME,
794                     Constants.COMPONENT_REF_CLASSNAME,
795                     Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME,
796                     Constants.COMPONENT_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME,
797                     Constants.COMPONENT_TYPE_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME,
798                     Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
799                     Constants.CONTEXT_REF_CLASSNAME,
800                     Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME,
801                     Constants.PRE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
802                     Constants.POST_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
803                     Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME,
804                     Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME,
805                     Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME,
806                     Constants.ON_DEACTIVATE_CLASSNAME,
807                     Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME );
808    final Map<String, Collection<String>> exceptions = new HashMap<>();
809    exceptions.put( Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
810                    Arrays.asList( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
811                                   Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
812                                   Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME ) );
813    exceptions.put( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME,
814                    Collections.singletonList( Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME ) );
815    exceptions.put( Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME,
816                    Collections.singletonList( Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME ) );
817
818    MemberChecks.verifyNoOverlappingAnnotations( method, annotations, exceptions );
819  }
820
821  private void verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
822    throws ProcessorException
823  {
824    MemberChecks.verifyNoOverlappingAnnotations( field,
825                                                 Arrays.asList( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
826                                                                Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME ),
827                                                 Collections.emptyMap() );
828  }
829
830  @Nonnull
831  private String getPropertyAccessorName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method, @Nonnull final String specifiedName )
832    throws ProcessorException
833  {
834    String name = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, specifiedName );
835    if ( null != name )
836    {
837      return name;
838    }
839    if ( method.getReturnType().getKind() == TypeKind.BOOLEAN )
840    {
841      name = deriveName( method, ISSER_PATTERN, specifiedName );
842      if ( null != name )
843      {
844        return name;
845      }
846    }
847    return method.getSimpleName().toString();
848  }
849
850  private void validate( final boolean allowEmpty, @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
851    throws ProcessorException
852  {
853    component.getCascadeDisposes().values().forEach( CascadeDisposeDescriptor::validate );
854    component.getObservables().values().forEach( ObservableDescriptor::validate );
855    component.getMemoizes().values().forEach( e -> e.validate( processingEnv ) );
856    component.getObserves().values().forEach( ObserveDescriptor::validate );
857    component.getDependencies().values().forEach( DependencyDescriptor::validate );
858    component.getReferences().values().forEach( ReferenceDescriptor::validate );
859    component.getInverses().values().forEach( e -> e.validate( processingEnv ) );
860
861    final boolean hasZeroReactiveElements =
862      component.getObservables().isEmpty() &&
863      component.getActions().isEmpty() &&
864      component.getMemoizes().isEmpty() &&
865      component.getDependencies().isEmpty() &&
866      component.getCascadeDisposes().isEmpty() &&
867      component.getReferences().isEmpty() &&
868      component.getInverses().isEmpty() &&
869      component.getObserves().isEmpty();
870
871    final TypeElement element = component.getElement();
872    if ( null != component.getDefaultPriority() &&
873         component.getMemoizes().isEmpty() &&
874         component.getObserves().isEmpty() &&
875         isWarningNotSuppressed( element, Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT_PRIORITY ) )
876    {
877      final String message =
878        MemberChecks.toSimpleName( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) + " target should not specify " +
879        "the defaultPriority parameter unless it contains methods annotated with either the " +
880        MemberChecks.toSimpleName( Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME ) + " annotation or the " +
881        MemberChecks.toSimpleName( Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME ) + " annotation. " +
882        suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT_PRIORITY );
883      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, element );
884    }
885    if ( !allowEmpty && hasZeroReactiveElements )
886    {
887      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has no methods annotated with @Action, " +
888                                    "@CascadeDispose, @Memoize, @Observable, @Inverse, " +
889                                    "@Reference, @ComponentDependency or @Observe", element );
890    }
891    else if ( allowEmpty &&
892              !hasZeroReactiveElements &&
893              isWarningNotSuppressed( element, Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_ALLOW_EMPTY ) )
894    {
895      final String message =
896        "@ArezComponent target has specified allowEmpty = true but has methods " +
897        "annotated with @Action, @CascadeDispose, @Memoize, @Observable, @Inverse, " +
898        "@Reference, @ComponentDependency or @Observe. " +
899        suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_ALLOW_EMPTY );
900      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, element );
901    }
902
903    for ( final ExecutableElement componentIdRef : component.getComponentIdRefs() )
904    {
905      if ( null != component.getComponentId() &&
906           !processingEnv.getTypeUtils()
907             .isSameType( component.getComponentId().getReturnType(), componentIdRef.getReturnType() ) )
908      {
909        throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentIdRef target has a return type " + componentIdRef.getReturnType() +
910                                      " and a @ComponentId annotated method with a return type " +
911                                      componentIdRef.getReturnType() + ". The types must match.",
912                                      element );
913      }
914      else if ( null == component.getComponentId() &&
915                !processingEnv.getTypeUtils()
916                  .isSameType( processingEnv.getTypeUtils().getPrimitiveType( TypeKind.INT ),
917                               componentIdRef.getReturnType() ) )
918      {
919        throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentIdRef target has a return type " + componentIdRef.getReturnType() +
920                                      " but no @ComponentId annotated method. The type is expected to be of " +
921                                      "type int.", element );
922      }
923    }
924    for ( final ExecutableElement constructor : ElementsUtil.getConstructors( element ) )
925    {
926      if ( Elements.Origin.EXPLICIT == processingEnv.getElementUtils().getOrigin( constructor ) &&
927           constructor.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PUBLIC ) &&
928           ElementsUtil.isWarningNotSuppressed( constructor, Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_CONSTRUCTOR ) )
929      {
930        final String instruction =
931          component.isStingEnabled() ?
932          "The type is instantiated by the sting injection framework and should have a package-access constructor. " :
933          "It is recommended that a static create method be added to the component that is responsible " +
934          "for instantiating the arez implementation class. ";
935
936        final String message =
937          MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
938                                  "have a public constructor. " + instruction +
939                                  MemberChecks.suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_CONSTRUCTOR,
940                                                             Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) );
941        processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, message, constructor );
942      }
943    }
944    if ( null != component.getDeclaredDefaultReadOutsideTransaction() &&
945         component.getObservables().isEmpty() &&
946         component.getMemoizes().isEmpty() &&
947         isWarningNotSuppressed( element, Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT ) )
948    {
949      final String message =
950        "@ArezComponent target has specified a value for the defaultReadOutsideTransaction parameter but does not " +
951        "contain any methods annotated with either @Memoize or @Observable. " +
952        suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT );
953      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, element );
954    }
955    if ( null != component.getDeclaredDefaultWriteOutsideTransaction() &&
956         component.getObservables().isEmpty() &&
957         isWarningNotSuppressed( element, Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT ) )
958    {
959      final String message =
960        "@ArezComponent target has specified a value for the defaultWriteOutsideTransaction parameter but does not " +
961        "contain any methods annotated with @Observable. " +
962        suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_UNNECESSARY_DEFAULT );
963      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, element );
964    }
965  }
966
967  private void processCascadeDisposeFields( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
968  {
969    ElementsUtil.getFields( component.getElement() )
970      .stream()
971      .filter( f -> AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( f, Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME ) )
972      .forEach( field -> processCascadeDisposeField( component, field ) );
973  }
974
975  private void processCascadeDisposeField( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
976                                           @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
977  {
978    verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( field );
979    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
980                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
981                                         Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
982                                         field );
983    mustBeCascadeDisposeTypeCompatible( field );
984    component.addCascadeDispose( new CascadeDisposeDescriptor( field ) );
985  }
986
987  @Nonnull
988  private String suppressedBy( @Nonnull final String warning )
989  {
990    return MemberChecks.suppressedBy( warning, Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
991  }
992
993  private boolean isWarningNotSuppressed( @Nonnull final Element element, @Nonnull final String warning )
994  {
995    return !ElementsUtil.isWarningSuppressed( element,
996                                              warning,
997                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
998  }
999
1000  @SuppressWarnings( "SameParameterValue" )
1001  @Nonnull
1002  private String extractName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1003                              @Nonnull final Function<ExecutableElement, String> function,
1004                              @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
1005  {
1006    return AnnotationsUtil.extractName( method, function, annotationClassname, "name", Constants.SENTINEL );
1007  }
1008
1009  private void mustBeCascadeDisposeTypeCompatible( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
1010  {
1011    final TypeMirror typeMirror = field.asType();
1012    if ( !isAssignable( typeMirror, getDisposableTypeElement() ) )
1013    {
1014      final TypeElement typeElement = (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( typeMirror );
1015      final AnnotationMirror value =
1016        null != typeElement ?
1017        AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) :
1018        null;
1019      if ( null == value || !isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement ) )
1020      {
1021        throw new ProcessorException( "@CascadeDispose target must be assignable to " +
1022                                      Constants.DISPOSABLE_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated with the @ArezComponent " +
1023                                      "annotation where the disposeNotifier does not resolve to DISABLE",
1024                                      field );
1025      }
1026    }
1027  }
1028
1029  private void addCascadeDisposeMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1030                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1031                                        @Nullable final ObservableDescriptor observable )
1032  {
1033    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME, method );
1034    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME, method );
1035    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
1036                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1037                                         Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME,
1038                                         method );
1039    mustBeCascadeDisposeTypeCompatible( method );
1040    component.addCascadeDispose( new CascadeDisposeDescriptor( method, observable ) );
1041  }
1042
1043  private void mustBeCascadeDisposeTypeCompatible( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1044  {
1045    final TypeMirror typeMirror = method.getReturnType();
1046    if ( !isAssignable( typeMirror, getDisposableTypeElement() ) )
1047    {
1048      final TypeElement typeElement = (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( typeMirror );
1049      final AnnotationMirror value =
1050        null != typeElement ?
1051        AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) :
1052        null;
1053      if ( null == value || !isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement ) )
1054      {
1055        //The type of the field must implement {@link arez.Disposable} or must be annotated by {@link ArezComponent}
1056        throw new ProcessorException( "@CascadeDispose target must return a type assignable to " +
1057                                      Constants.DISPOSABLE_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated with @ArezComponent",
1058                                      method );
1059      }
1060    }
1061  }
1062
1063  private void addOrUpdateDependency( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1064                                      @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1065                                      @Nonnull final ObservableDescriptor observable )
1066  {
1067    final DependencyDescriptor dependencyDescriptor =
1068      component.getDependencies().computeIfAbsent( method, m -> createMethodDependencyDescriptor( component, method ) );
1069    dependencyDescriptor.setObservable( observable );
1070  }
1071
1072  private void addAction( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1073                          @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1074                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1075                          @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1076    throws ProcessorException
1077  {
1078    MemberChecks.mustBeWrappable( component.getElement(),
1079                                  Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1080                                  Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME,
1081                                  method );
1082
1083    final String name =
1084      extractName( method, m -> m.getSimpleName().toString(), Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME );
1085    checkNameUnique( component, name, method, Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME );
1086    final boolean mutation = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "mutation" );
1087    final boolean requireNewTransaction =
1088      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "requireNewTransaction" );
1089    final boolean reportParameters = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "reportParameters" );
1090    final boolean reportResult = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "reportResult" );
1091    final boolean verifyRequired = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "verifyRequired" );
1092    final ActionDescriptor action =
1093      new ActionDescriptor( component,
1094                            name,
1095                            requireNewTransaction,
1096                            mutation,
1097                            verifyRequired,
1098                            reportParameters,
1099                            reportResult,
1100                            method,
1101                            methodType );
1102    component.getActions().put( action.getName(), action );
1103  }
1104
1105  private void addObserve( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1106                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1107                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1108                           @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1109    throws ProcessorException
1110  {
1111    final String name = deriveObserveName( method, annotation );
1112    checkNameUnique( component, name, method, Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME );
1113    final boolean mutation = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "mutation" );
1114    final boolean observeLowerPriorityDependencies =
1115      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "observeLowerPriorityDependencies" );
1116    final boolean nestedActionsAllowed = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "nestedActionsAllowed" );
1117    final VariableElement priority = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "priority" );
1118    final boolean reportParameters = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "reportParameters" );
1119    final boolean reportResult = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "reportResult" );
1120    final VariableElement executor = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "executor" );
1121    final VariableElement depType = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "depType" );
1122
1123    component
1124      .findOrCreateObserve( name )
1125      .setObserveMethod( mutation,
1126                         toPriority( component.getDefaultPriority(), priority ),
1127                         executor.getSimpleName().toString().equals( "INTERNAL" ),
1128                         reportParameters,
1129                         reportResult,
1130                         depType.getSimpleName().toString(),
1131                         observeLowerPriorityDependencies,
1132                         nestedActionsAllowed,
1133                         method,
1134                         methodType );
1135  }
1136
1137  @Nonnull
1138  private String deriveObserveName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1139                                    @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
1140    throws ProcessorException
1141  {
1142    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
1143    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
1144    {
1145      return method.getSimpleName().toString();
1146    }
1147    else
1148    {
1149      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1150      {
1151        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observe target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1152                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1153      }
1154      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1155      {
1156        throw new ProcessorException( "@Observe target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1157                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
1158      }
1159      return name;
1160    }
1161  }
1162
1163  private void addOnDepsChange( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1164                                @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1165                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1166    throws ProcessorException
1167  {
1168    final String name =
1169      deriveHookName( component, method,
1170                      ON_DEPS_CHANGE_PATTERN,
1171                      "DepsChange",
1172                      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" ) );
1173    setOnDepsChange( component, component.findOrCreateObserve( name ), method );
1174  }
1175
1176  private void addObserverRef( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1177                               @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1178                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1179                               @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1180    throws ProcessorException
1181  {
1182    mustBeStandardRefMethod( processingEnv,
1183                             component,
1184                             method,
1185                             Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME );
1186    MemberChecks.mustReturnAnInstanceOf( processingEnv,
1187                                         method,
1188                                         Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME,
1189                                         Constants.OBSERVER_CLASSNAME );
1190
1191    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
1192    final String name;
1193    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1194    {
1195      name = deriveName( method, OBSERVER_REF_PATTERN, declaredName );
1196      if ( null == name )
1197      {
1198        throw new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with @ObserverRef should specify name or be " +
1199                                      "named according to the convention get[Name]Observer", method );
1200      }
1201    }
1202    else
1203    {
1204      name = declaredName;
1205      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1206      {
1207        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObserverRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1208                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1209      }
1210      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1211      {
1212        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObserverRef target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1213                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
1214      }
1215    }
1216    component.getObserverRefs().computeIfAbsent( name, s -> new ArrayList<>() )
1217      .add( new CandidateMethod( method, methodType ) );
1218  }
1219
1220  private void addMemoize( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1221                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1222                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1223                           @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1224    throws ProcessorException
1225  {
1226    final String name = deriveMemoizeName( method, annotation );
1227    checkNameUnique( component, name, method, Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME );
1228    final boolean keepAlive = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "keepAlive" );
1229    final boolean reportResult = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "reportResult" );
1230    final boolean observeLowerPriorityDependencies =
1231      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "observeLowerPriorityDependencies" );
1232    final VariableElement readOutsideTransaction =
1233      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "readOutsideTransaction" );
1234    final VariableElement priority = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "priority" );
1235    final VariableElement depType = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "depType" );
1236    final String depTypeAsString = depType.getSimpleName().toString();
1237    component.findOrCreateMemoize( name ).setMemoize( method,
1238                                                      methodType,
1239                                                      keepAlive,
1240                                                      toPriority( component.getDefaultPriority(),
1241                                                                  priority ),
1242                                                      reportResult,
1243                                                      observeLowerPriorityDependencies,
1244                                                      readOutsideTransaction.getSimpleName().toString(),
1245                                                      depTypeAsString );
1246  }
1247
1248  @Nonnull
1249  private Priority toPriority( @Nullable final Priority defaultPriority,
1250                               @Nonnull final VariableElement priorityElement )
1251  {
1252    final String priorityName = priorityElement.getSimpleName().toString();
1253    return "DEFAULT".equals( priorityName ) ?
1254           null != defaultPriority ? defaultPriority : Priority.NORMAL :
1255           Priority.valueOf( priorityName );
1256  }
1257
1258  private void autodetectObservableInitializers( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
1259  {
1260    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : component.getObservables().values() )
1261    {
1262      if ( null == observable.getInitializer() && observable.hasGetter() )
1263      {
1264        if ( observable.hasSetter() )
1265        {
1266          final boolean initializer =
1267            autodetectInitializer( observable.getGetter() ) && autodetectInitializer( observable.getSetter() );
1268          observable.setInitializer( initializer );
1269        }
1270        else
1271        {
1272          observable.setInitializer( autodetectInitializer( observable.getGetter() ) );
1273        }
1274      }
1275    }
1276  }
1277
1278  private boolean hasDependencyAnnotation( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1279  {
1280    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME );
1281  }
1282
1283  private void ensureTargetTypeAligns( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1284                                       @Nonnull final InverseDescriptor descriptor,
1285                                       @Nonnull final TypeMirror target )
1286  {
1287    if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isSameType( target, component.getElement().asType() ) )
1288    {
1289      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to find an associated @Reference annotation with " +
1290                                    "a target type equal to " + component.getElement().asType() + " but the actual " +
1291                                    "target type is " + target, descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1292    }
1293  }
1294
1295  @Nullable
1296  private TypeElement getInverseManyTypeTarget( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1297  {
1298    final TypeName typeName = TypeName.get( method.getReturnType() );
1299    if ( typeName instanceof final ParameterizedTypeName type )
1300    {
1301      if ( isSupportedInverseCollectionType( type.rawType.toString() ) && !type.typeArguments.isEmpty() )
1302      {
1303        final TypeElement typeElement = getTypeElement( type.typeArguments.get( 0 ).toString() );
1304        if ( AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
1305        {
1306          return typeElement;
1307        }
1308        else
1309        {
1310          throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to return a type annotated with " +
1311                                        Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, method );
1312        }
1313      }
1314    }
1315    return null;
1316  }
1317
1318  private boolean isSupportedInverseCollectionType( @Nonnull final String typeClassname )
1319  {
1320    return Collection.class.getName().equals( typeClassname ) ||
1321           Set.class.getName().equals( typeClassname ) ||
1322           List.class.getName().equals( typeClassname );
1323  }
1324
1325  @Nonnull
1326  private String getInverseReferenceNameParameter( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1327                                                   @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1328  {
1329    final String declaredName =
1330      (String) AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValue( method,
1331                                                   Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME,
1332                                                   "referenceName" ).getValue();
1333    final String name;
1334    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1335    {
1336      name = firstCharacterToLowerCase( component.getElement().getSimpleName().toString() );
1337    }
1338    else
1339    {
1340      name = declaredName;
1341      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1342      {
1343        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid referenceName '" + name + "'. The " +
1344                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1345      }
1346      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1347      {
1348        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid referenceName '" + name + "'. The " +
1349                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
1350      }
1351    }
1352    return name;
1353  }
1354
1355  private void linkDependencies( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1356                                 @Nonnull final Collection<CandidateMethod> candidates )
1357  {
1358    component.getObservables()
1359      .values()
1360      .stream()
1361      .filter( ObservableDescriptor::hasGetter )
1362      .filter( o -> hasDependencyAnnotation( o.getGetter() ) )
1363      .forEach( o -> addOrUpdateDependency( component, o.getGetter(), o ) );
1364
1365    component.getMemoizes()
1366      .values()
1367      .stream()
1368      .filter( MemoizeDescriptor::hasMemoize )
1369      .map( MemoizeDescriptor::getMethod )
1370      .filter( this::hasDependencyAnnotation )
1371      .forEach( method1 -> component.addDependency( createMethodDependencyDescriptor( component, method1 ) ) );
1372
1373    candidates
1374      .stream()
1375      .map( CandidateMethod::getMethod )
1376      .filter( this::hasDependencyAnnotation )
1377      .forEach( method -> component.addDependency( createMethodDependencyDescriptor( component, method ) ) );
1378  }
1379
1380  private void linkCascadeDisposeObservables( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
1381  {
1382    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : component.getObservables().values() )
1383    {
1384      final CascadeDisposeDescriptor cascadeDisposeDescriptor = observable.getCascadeDisposeDescriptor();
1385      if ( null == cascadeDisposeDescriptor )
1386      {
1387        //@CascadeDisposable can only occur on getter so if we don't have it then we look in
1388        // cascadeDisposableDescriptor list to see if we can match getter
1389        final CascadeDisposeDescriptor descriptor = component.getCascadeDisposes().get( observable.getGetter() );
1390        if ( null != descriptor )
1391        {
1392          descriptor.setObservable( observable );
1393        }
1394      }
1395    }
1396  }
1397
1398  private void linkCascadeDisposeReferences( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
1399  {
1400    for ( final ReferenceDescriptor reference : component.getReferences().values() )
1401    {
1402      final CascadeDisposeDescriptor cascadeDisposeDescriptor = reference.getCascadeDisposeDescriptor();
1403      if ( null == cascadeDisposeDescriptor && reference.hasMethod() )
1404      {
1405        final CascadeDisposeDescriptor descriptor = component.getCascadeDisposes().get( reference.getMethod() );
1406        if ( null != descriptor )
1407        {
1408          descriptor.setReference( reference );
1409        }
1410      }
1411    }
1412  }
1413
1414  private void linkObserverRefs( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
1415  {
1416    for ( final Map.Entry<String, List<CandidateMethod>> entry : component.getObserverRefs().entrySet() )
1417    {
1418      final String key = entry.getKey();
1419      final List<CandidateMethod> methods = entry.getValue();
1420      final ObserveDescriptor observed = component.getObserves().get( key );
1421      if ( null != observed )
1422      {
1423        methods.stream().map( CandidateMethod::getMethod ).forEach( observed::addRefMethod );
1424      }
1425      else
1426      {
1427        throw new ProcessorException( "@ObserverRef target defined observer named '" + key + "' but no " +
1428                                      "@Observe method with that name exists", methods.get( 0 ).getMethod() );
1429      }
1430    }
1431  }
1432
1433  @Nullable
1434  private Boolean isInitializerRequired( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement element )
1435  {
1436    final AnnotationMirror annotation =
1437      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( element, Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME );
1438    final AnnotationValue v =
1439      null == annotation ? null : AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( annotation, "initializer" );
1440    final String value = null == v ? "AUTODETECT" : ( (VariableElement) v.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
1441    return switch ( value )
1442      {
1443        case "ENABLE" -> Boolean.TRUE;
1444        case "DISABLE" -> Boolean.FALSE;
1445        default -> null;
1446      };
1447  }
1448
1449  private boolean autodetectInitializer( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement element )
1450  {
1451    return element.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) &&
1452           (
1453             (
1454               // Getter
1455               element.getReturnType().getKind() != TypeKind.VOID &&
1456               AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( element ) &&
1457               !AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( element, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME )
1458             ) ||
1459             (
1460               // Setter
1461               1 == element.getParameters().size() &&
1462               AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( element.getParameters().get( 0 ) )
1463             )
1464           );
1465  }
1466
1467  private void checkNameUnique( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component, @Nonnull final String name,
1468                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement sourceMethod,
1469                                @Nonnull final String sourceAnnotationName )
1470    throws ProcessorException
1471  {
1472    final ActionDescriptor action = component.getActions().get( name );
1473    if ( null != action )
1474    {
1475      throw toException( name,
1476                         sourceAnnotationName,
1477                         sourceMethod,
1478                         Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME,
1479                         action.getAction() );
1480    }
1481    final MemoizeDescriptor memoize = component.getMemoizes().get( name );
1482    if ( null != memoize && memoize.hasMemoize() )
1483    {
1484      throw toException( name,
1485                         sourceAnnotationName,
1486                         sourceMethod,
1487                         Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME,
1488                         memoize.getMethod() );
1489    }
1490    // Observe have pairs so let the caller determine whether a duplicate occurs in that scenario
1491    if ( !sourceAnnotationName.equals( Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME ) )
1492    {
1493      final ObserveDescriptor observed = component.getObserves().get( name );
1494      if ( null != observed )
1495      {
1496        throw toException( name,
1497                           sourceAnnotationName,
1498                           sourceMethod,
1499                           Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME,
1500                           observed.getMethod() );
1501      }
1502    }
1503    // Observables have pairs so let the caller determine whether a duplicate occurs in that scenario
1504    if ( !sourceAnnotationName.equals( Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME ) )
1505    {
1506      final ObservableDescriptor observable = component.getObservables().get( name );
1507      if ( null != observable )
1508      {
1509        throw toException( name,
1510                           sourceAnnotationName,
1511                           sourceMethod,
1512                           Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME,
1513                           observable.getDefiner() );
1514      }
1515    }
1516  }
1517
1518  @Nonnull
1519  private ProcessorException toException( @Nonnull final String name,
1520                                          @Nonnull final String sourceAnnotationName,
1521                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement sourceMethod,
1522                                          @Nonnull final String targetAnnotationName,
1523                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement targetElement )
1524  {
1525    return new ProcessorException( "Method annotated with " + MemberChecks.toSimpleName( sourceAnnotationName ) +
1526                                   " specified name " + name + " that duplicates " +
1527                                   MemberChecks.toSimpleName( targetAnnotationName ) + " defined by method " +
1528                                   targetElement.getSimpleName(), sourceMethod );
1529  }
1530
1531  private void processComponentDependencyFields( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component )
1532  {
1533    ElementsUtil.getFields( component.getElement() )
1534      .stream()
1535      .filter( f -> AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( f, Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME ) )
1536      .forEach( field -> processComponentDependencyField( component, field ) );
1537  }
1538
1539  private void processComponentDependencyField( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1540                                                @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
1541  {
1542    verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( field );
1543    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
1544                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1545                                         Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1546                                         field );
1547    component.addDependency( createFieldDependencyDescriptor( component, field ) );
1548  }
1549
1550  private void addReference( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1551                             @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1552                             @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1553                             @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
1554  {
1555    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1556    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( component.getElement(),
1557                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1558                                         Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME,
1559                                         method );
1560    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1561    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1562    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, method );
1563
1564    final String name = getReferenceName( annotation, method );
1565    final String linkType = getLinkType( method );
1566    final String inverseName;
1567    final Multiplicity inverseMultiplicity;
1568    if ( hasInverse( annotation ) )
1569    {
1570      inverseMultiplicity = getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( annotation );
1571      inverseName = getReferenceInverseName( component, annotation, method, inverseMultiplicity );
1572      final TypeMirror returnType = method.getReturnType();
1573      if ( !( returnType instanceof DeclaredType ) ||
1574           !AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( ( (DeclaredType) returnType ).asElement(),
1575                                                 Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
1576      {
1577        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to return a type annotated with " +
1578                                      MemberChecks.toSimpleName( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) +
1579                                      " if there is an inverse reference", method );
1580      }
1581    }
1582    else
1583    {
1584      inverseName = null;
1585      inverseMultiplicity = null;
1586    }
1587    final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor = component.findOrCreateReference( name );
1588    descriptor.setMethod( method, methodType, linkType, inverseName, inverseMultiplicity );
1589    verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedInverseMethod( component, descriptor );
1590  }
1591
1592  private boolean hasInverse( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
1593  {
1594    final VariableElement variableElement = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverse" );
1595    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
1596      {
1597        case "ENABLE" -> true;
1598        case "DISABLE" -> false;
1599        default -> null != AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( annotation, "inverseName" ) ||
1600                   null != AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( annotation, "inverseMultiplicity" );
1601      };
1602  }
1603
1604  private void verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedReferenceMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1605                                                              @Nonnull final InverseDescriptor descriptor )
1606  {
1607    final Multiplicity multiplicity =
1608      ElementsUtil
1609        .getMethods( descriptor.getTargetType(),
1610                     processingEnv.getElementUtils(),
1611                     processingEnv.getTypeUtils() )
1612        .stream()
1613        .map( m -> {
1614          final AnnotationMirror a =
1615            AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( m, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME );
1616          if ( null != a && getReferenceName( a, m ).equals( descriptor.getReferenceName() ) )
1617          {
1618            if ( null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverse" ) &&
1619                 null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverseName" ) &&
1620                 null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( a, "inverseMultiplicity" ) )
1621            {
1622              throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target found an associated @Reference on the method '" +
1623                                            m.getSimpleName() + "' on type '" +
1624                                            descriptor.getTargetType().getQualifiedName() + "' but the " +
1625                                            "annotation has not configured an inverse.",
1626                                            descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1627            }
1628            ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, m.getReturnType() );
1629            return getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( a );
1630          }
1631          else
1632          {
1633            return null;
1634          }
1635        } )
1636        .filter( Objects::nonNull )
1637        .findAny()
1638        .orElse( null );
1639    if ( null == multiplicity )
1640    {
1641      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to find an associated @Reference annotation with " +
1642                                    "a name parameter equal to '" + descriptor.getReferenceName() + "' on class " +
