1643                                    descriptor.getTargetType().getQualifiedName() + " but is unable to " +
1644                                    "locate a matching method.", descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1645    }
1646
1647    if ( descriptor.getMultiplicity() != multiplicity )
1648    {
1649      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target has a multiplicity of " + descriptor.getMultiplicity() +
1650                                    " but that associated @Reference has a multiplicity of " + multiplicity +
1651                                    ". The multiplicity must align.", descriptor.getObservable().getGetter() );
1652    }
1653  }
1654
1655  @Nonnull
1656  private String getLinkType( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1657  {
1658    return AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME, "load" );
1659  }
1660
1661  @Nonnull
1662  private String getReferenceName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1663                                   @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1664  {
1665    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
1666    final String name;
1667    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1668    {
1669      final String candidate = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
1670      if ( null == candidate )
1671      {
1672        name = method.getSimpleName().toString();
1673      }
1674      else
1675      {
1676        name = candidate;
1677      }
1678    }
1679    else
1680    {
1681      name = declaredName;
1682      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1683      {
1684        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1685                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1686      }
1687      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1688      {
1689        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1690                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
1691      }
1692    }
1693    return name;
1694  }
1695
1696  @Nonnull
1697  private Multiplicity getReferenceInverseMultiplicity( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation )
1698  {
1699    final VariableElement variableElement =
1700      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverseMultiplicity" );
1701    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
1702      {
1703        case "MANY" -> Multiplicity.MANY;
1704        case "ONE" -> Multiplicity.ONE;
1705        default -> Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
1706      };
1707  }
1708
1709  @Nonnull
1710  private String getReferenceInverseName( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1711                                          @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
1712                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
1713                                          @Nonnull final Multiplicity multiplicity )
1714  {
1715    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "inverseName" );
1716    final String name;
1717    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
1718    {
1719      final String baseName = component.getElement().getSimpleName().toString();
1720      return firstCharacterToLowerCase( baseName ) + ( Multiplicity.MANY == multiplicity ? "s" : "" );
1721    }
1722    else
1723    {
1724      name = declaredName;
1725      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1726      {
1727        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid inverseName '" + name + "'. The " +
1728                                      "inverseName must be a valid java identifier.", method );
1729      }
1730      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1731      {
1732        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target specified an invalid inverseName '" + name + "'. The " +
1733                                      "inverseName must not be a java keyword.", method );
1734      }
1735    }
1736    return name;
1737  }
1738
1739  private void ensureTargetTypeAligns( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1740                                       @Nonnull final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor,
1741                                       @Nonnull final TypeMirror target )
1742  {
1743    if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isSameType( target, component.getElement().asType() ) )
1744    {
1745      throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to find an associated @Inverse annotation with " +
1746                                    "a target type equal to " + component.getElement().getQualifiedName() + " but " +
1747                                    "the actual target type is " + target, descriptor.getMethod() );
1748    }
1749  }
1750
1751  private void verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedInverseMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
1752                                                            @Nonnull final ReferenceDescriptor descriptor )
1753  {
1754    final TypeElement element =
1755      (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( descriptor.getMethod().getReturnType() );
1756    final String defaultInverseName =
1757      descriptor.hasInverse() ?
1758      null :
1759      firstCharacterToLowerCase( component.getElement().getSimpleName().toString() ) + "s";
1760    final Multiplicity multiplicity =
1761      ElementsUtil
1762        .getMethods( element, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() )
1763        .stream()
1764        .map( m -> {
1765          final AnnotationMirror a = AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( m, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
1766          if ( null == a )
1767          {
1768            return null;
1769          }
1770          final String inverseName = getInverseName( a, m );
1771          if ( !descriptor.hasInverse() && inverseName.equals( defaultInverseName ) )
1772          {
1773            throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target has not configured an inverse but there is an " +
1774                                          "associated @Inverse annotated method named '" + m.getSimpleName() +
1775                                          "' on type '" + element.getQualifiedName() + "'.",
1776                                          descriptor.getMethod() );
1777          }
1778          if ( descriptor.hasInverse() && inverseName.equals( descriptor.getInverseName() ) )
1779          {
1780            final TypeElement target = getInverseManyTypeTarget( m );
1781            if ( null != target )
1782            {
1783              ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, target.asType() );
1784              return Multiplicity.MANY;
1785            }
1786            else
1787            {
1788              ensureTargetTypeAligns( component, descriptor, m.getReturnType() );
1789              return AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( m ) ? Multiplicity.ONE : Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
1790            }
1791          }
1792          else
1793          {
1794            return null;
1795          }
1796        } )
1797        .filter( Objects::nonNull )
1798        .findAny()
1799        .orElse( null );
1800
1801    if ( descriptor.hasInverse() )
1802    {
1803      if ( null == multiplicity )
1804      {
1805        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target expected to find an associated @Inverse annotation " +
1806                                      "with a name parameter equal to '" + descriptor.getInverseName() + "' on " +
1807                                      "class " + descriptor.getMethod().getReturnType() + " but is unable to " +
1808                                      "locate a matching method.", descriptor.getMethod() );
1809      }
1810
1811      final Multiplicity inverseMultiplicity = descriptor.getInverseMultiplicity();
1812      if ( inverseMultiplicity != multiplicity )
1813      {
1814        throw new ProcessorException( "@Reference target has an inverseMultiplicity of " + inverseMultiplicity +
1815                                      " but that associated @Inverse has a multiplicity of " + multiplicity +
1816                                      ". The multiplicity must align.", descriptor.getMethod() );
1817      }
1818    }
1819  }
1820
1821  @Nonnull
1822  private DependencyDescriptor createMethodDependencyDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
1823                                                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
1824  {
1825    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1826    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
1827                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1828                                         Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1829                                         method );
1830    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1831    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, method );
1832
1833    final boolean validateTypeAtRuntime =
1834      (Boolean) AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValue( method,
1835                                                    Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1836                                                    "validateTypeAtRuntime" ).getValue();
1837
1838    final TypeMirror type = method.getReturnType();
1839    if ( TypeKind.DECLARED != type.getKind() )
1840    {
1841      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must return a non-primitive value", method );
1842    }
1843    if ( !validateTypeAtRuntime )
1844    {
1845      final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
1846      if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, disposeNotifier.asType() ) )
1847      {
1848        final TypeElement typeElement = (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( type );
1849        if ( !isActAsComponentAnnotated( typeElement ) && !isDisposeTrackableComponent( typeElement ) )
1850        {
1851          throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must return an instance compatible with " +
1852                                        Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated " +
1853                                        "with @ArezComponent(disposeNotifier=ENABLE) or @ActAsComponent", method );
1854        }
1855      }
1856    }
1857
1858    final boolean cascade = isActionCascade( method );
1859    return new DependencyDescriptor( descriptor, method, cascade );
1860  }
1861
1862  @Nonnull
1863  private DependencyDescriptor createFieldDependencyDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
1864                                                                @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
1865  {
1866    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
1867                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1868                                         Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1869                                         field );
1870    MemberChecks.mustBeFinal( Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME, field );
1871
1872    final boolean validateTypeAtRuntime =
1873      (Boolean) AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValue( field,
1874                                                    Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1875                                                    "validateTypeAtRuntime" ).getValue();
1876
1877    final TypeMirror type = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asMemberOf( descriptor.asDeclaredType(), field );
1878    if ( TypeKind.TYPEVAR != type.getKind() && TypeKind.DECLARED != type.getKind() )
1879    {
1880      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must be a non-primitive value", field );
1881    }
1882    if ( !validateTypeAtRuntime )
1883    {
1884      final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
1885      if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, disposeNotifier.asType() ) )
1886      {
1887        final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( type );
1888        if ( !( element instanceof TypeElement ) ||
1889             !isActAsComponentAnnotated( (TypeElement) element ) &&
1890             !isDisposeTrackableComponent( (TypeElement) element ) )
1891        {
1892          throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target must be an instance compatible with " +
1893                                        Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME + " or a type annotated " +
1894                                        "with @ArezComponent(disposeNotifier=ENABLE) or @ActAsComponent", field );
1895        }
1896      }
1897    }
1898
1899    if ( !isActionCascade( field ) )
1900    {
1901      throw new ProcessorException( "@ComponentDependency target defined an action of 'SET_NULL' but the " +
1902                                    "dependency is on a final field and can not be set to null.", field );
1903
1904    }
1905
1906    return new DependencyDescriptor( descriptor, field );
1907  }
1908
1909  private boolean isActionCascade( @Nonnull final Element method )
1910  {
1911    final String value =
1912      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( method,
1913                                                  Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME,
1914                                                  "action" );
1915    return "CASCADE".equals( value );
1916  }
1917
1918  @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
1919  private boolean isActAsComponentAnnotated( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
1920  {
1921    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
1922  }
1923
1924  @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanMethodIsAlwaysInverted" )
1925  private boolean isDisposeTrackableComponent( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
1926  {
1927    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) &&
1928           isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement );
1929  }
1930
1931  @Nonnull
1932  private ComponentDescriptor parse( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
1933    throws ProcessorException
1934  {
1935    if ( ElementKind.CLASS != typeElement.getKind() && ElementKind.INTERFACE != typeElement.getKind() )
1936    {
1937      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must be a class or an interface", typeElement );
1938    }
1939    else if ( typeElement.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) )
1940    {
1941      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must not be final", typeElement );
1942    }
1943    else if ( ElementsUtil.isNonStaticNestedClass( typeElement ) )
1944    {
1945      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must not be a non-static nested class", typeElement );
1946    }
1947    final AnnotationMirror arezComponent =
1948      AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationByType( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
1949    final String declaredName = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "name" );
1950    final boolean disposeOnDeactivate = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "disposeOnDeactivate" );
1951    final boolean observableFlag = isComponentObservableRequired( arezComponent, disposeOnDeactivate );
1952    final boolean service = isService( typeElement );
1953    final boolean disposeNotifierFlag = isDisposableTrackableRequired( typeElement );
1954    final boolean allowEmpty = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "allowEmpty" );
1955    final List<VariableElement> fields = ElementsUtil.getFields( typeElement );
1956    ensureNoFieldInjections( fields );
1957    ensureNoMethodInjections( typeElement );
1958    final boolean sting = isStingIntegrationEnabled( arezComponent, service );
1959
1960    final AnnotationValue defaultReadOutsideTransaction =
1961      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultReadOutsideTransaction" );
1962    final AnnotationValue defaultWriteOutsideTransaction =
1963      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultWriteOutsideTransaction" );
1964
1965    final boolean requireEquals = isEqualsRequired( arezComponent );
1966    final boolean requireVerify = isVerifyRequired( arezComponent, typeElement );
1967
1968    if ( !typeElement.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
1969    {
1970      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target must be abstract", typeElement );
1971    }
1972
1973    final String name =
1974      Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) ?
1975      typeElement.getQualifiedName().toString().replace( ".", "_" ) :
1976      declaredName;
1977
1978    if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
1979    {
1980      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1981                                    "name must be a valid java identifier.", typeElement );
1982    }
1983    else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
1984    {
1985      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
1986                                    "name must not be a java keyword.", typeElement );
1987    }
1988
1989    verifyConstructors( typeElement, sting );
1990
1991    if ( sting && !( (DeclaredType) typeElement.asType() ).getTypeArguments().isEmpty() )
1992    {
1993      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
1994                                                          "enable sting integration and be a parameterized type" ),
1995                                    typeElement );
1996    }
1997    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_EAGER ) )
1998    {
1999      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2000                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2001                                                          Constants.STING_EAGER ),
2002                                    typeElement );
2003    }
2004    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_TYPED ) )
2005    {
2006      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2007                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2008                                                          Constants.STING_TYPED ),
2009                                    typeElement );
2010    }
2011    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_NAMED ) )
2012    {
2013      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2014                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2015                                                          Constants.STING_NAMED ),
2016                                    typeElement );
2017    }
2018    if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ) )
2019    {
2020      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2021                                                          "disable sting integration and be annotated with " +
2022                                                          Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ),
2023                                    typeElement );
2024    }
2025
2026    if ( !observableFlag && disposeOnDeactivate )
2027    {
2028      throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified observable = DISABLE and " +
2029                                    "disposeOnDeactivate = true which is not a valid combination", typeElement );
2030    }
2031
2032    if ( isWarningNotSuppressed( typeElement, Constants.WARNING_EXTENDS_COMPONENT ) )
2033    {
2034      TypeMirror parent = typeElement.getSuperclass();
2035      while ( null != parent )
2036      {
2037        final Element parentElement = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( parent );
2038        final TypeElement parentTypeElement =
2039          null != parentElement && ElementKind.CLASS == parentElement.getKind() ? (TypeElement) parentElement : null;
2040
2041        if ( null != parentTypeElement &&
2042             AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( parentTypeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
2043        {
2044          final String message =
2045            MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2046                                    "extend a class annotated with the " + Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME +
2047                                    " annotation. " + suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_EXTENDS_COMPONENT ) );
2048          processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, typeElement );
2049        }
2050        parent = null != parentTypeElement ? parentTypeElement.getSuperclass() : null;
2051      }
2052    }
2053
2054    final List<ExecutableElement> methods =
2055      ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() );
2056    final boolean generateToString = methods.stream().
2057      noneMatch( m -> m.getSimpleName().toString().equals( "toString" ) &&
2058                      m.getParameters().size() == 0 &&
2059                      !( m.getEnclosingElement().getSimpleName().toString().equals( "Object" ) &&
2060                         "java.lang".equals( processingEnv
2061                                               .getElementUtils()
2062                                               .getPackageOf( m.getEnclosingElement() )
2063                                               .getQualifiedName()
2064                                               .toString() ) ) );
2065
2066    final String priority = getDefaultPriority( arezComponent );
2067    final Priority defaultPriority =
2068      null == priority ? null : "DEFAULT".equals( priority ) ? Priority.NORMAL : Priority.valueOf( priority );
2069
2070    final String defaultReadOutsideTransactionValue =
2071      null == defaultReadOutsideTransaction ?
2072      null :
2073      ( (VariableElement) defaultReadOutsideTransaction.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
2074    final String defaultWriteOutsideTransactionValue =
2075      null == defaultWriteOutsideTransaction ?
2076      null :
2077      ( (VariableElement) defaultWriteOutsideTransaction.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
2078
2079    final ComponentDescriptor descriptor =
2080      new ComponentDescriptor( name,
2081                               defaultPriority,
2082                               observableFlag,
2083                               disposeNotifierFlag,
2084                               disposeOnDeactivate,
2085                               sting,
2086                               requireEquals,
2087                               requireVerify,
2088                               generateToString,
2089                               typeElement,
2090                               defaultReadOutsideTransactionValue,
2091                               defaultWriteOutsideTransactionValue );
2092
2093    analyzeCandidateMethods( descriptor, methods, processingEnv.getTypeUtils() );
2094    validate( allowEmpty, descriptor );
2095
2096    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : descriptor.getObservables().values() )
2097    {
2098      if ( observable.expectSetter() )
2099      {
2100        final TypeMirror returnType = observable.getGetterType().getReturnType();
2101        final TypeMirror parameterType = observable.getSetterType().getParameterTypes().get( 0 );
2102        if ( !processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isSameType( parameterType, returnType ) &&
2103             !parameterType.toString().equals( returnType.toString() ) )
2104        {
2105          throw new ProcessorException( "@Observable property defines a setter and getter with different types." +
2106                                        " Getter type: " + returnType + " Setter type: " + parameterType + ".",
2107                                        observable.getGetter() );
2108        }
2109      }
2110    }
2111
2112    final boolean idRequired = isIdRequired( arezComponent );
2113    descriptor.setIdRequired( idRequired );
2114    if ( !idRequired )
2115    {
2116      if ( descriptor.hasComponentIdMethod() )
2117      {
2118        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2119                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @ComponentId " +
2120                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2121      }
2122      if ( !descriptor.getComponentIdRefs().isEmpty() )
2123      {
2124        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2125                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @ComponentIdRef " +
2126                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2127      }
2128      if ( !descriptor.getInverses().isEmpty() )
2129      {
2130        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has specified the idRequired = DISABLE " +
2131                                      "annotation parameter but also has annotated a method with @Inverse " +
2132                                      "that requires idRequired = ENABLE.", typeElement );
2133      }
2134    }
2135
2136    warnOnUnmanagedComponentReferences( descriptor, fields );
2137
2138    return descriptor;
2139  }
2140
2141  private boolean isStingIntegrationEnabled( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent, final boolean service )
2142  {
2143    final VariableElement parameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "sting" );
2144    final String value = parameter.getSimpleName().toString();
2145    return "ENABLE".equals( value ) ||
2146           ( "AUTODETECT".equals( value ) &&
2147             service &&
2148             null != findTypeElement( Constants.STING_INJECTOR ) );
2149  }
2150
2151  private void verifyConstructors( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement, final boolean sting )
2152  {
2153    final List<ExecutableElement> constructors = ElementsUtil.getConstructors( typeElement );
2154    if ( constructors.size() > 1 )
2155    {
2156      if ( sting )
2157      {
2158        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2159                                                            "enable sting integration and have multiple constructors" ),
2160                                      typeElement );
2161      }
2162    }
2163
2164    for ( final ExecutableElement constructor : constructors )
2165    {
2166      if ( constructor.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED ) &&
2167           isWarningNotSuppressed( constructor, Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_CONSTRUCTOR ) )
2168      {
2169        final String message =
2170          MemberChecks.should( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2171                               "have a package access constructor. " +
2172                               suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_CONSTRUCTOR ) );
2173        processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, constructor );
2174      }
2175      verifyConstructorParameters( constructor, sting );
2176    }
2177  }
2178
2179  private void verifyConstructorParameters( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement constructor, final boolean sting )
2180  {
2181    for ( final VariableElement parameter : constructor.getParameters() )
2182    {
2183      final TypeMirror type = parameter.asType();
2184      if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsArrayType( type ) )
2185      {
2186        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2187                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains an array type" ),
2188                                      parameter );
2189      }
2190      else if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsWildcard( type ) )
2191      {
2192        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2193                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a wildcard type parameter" ),
2194                                      parameter );
2195      }
2196      else if ( sting && TypesUtil.containsRawType( type ) )
2197      {
2198        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2199                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a raw type" ),
2200                                      parameter );
2201      }
2202      else if ( !sting && AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( parameter, Constants.STING_NAMED ) )
2203      {
2204        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2205                                                            "disable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that is annotated with the " +
2206                                                            Constants.STING_NAMED + " annotation" ),
2207                                      parameter );
2208      }
2209      else if ( sting && TypeKind.DECLARED == type.getKind() && !( (DeclaredType) type ).getTypeArguments().isEmpty() )
2210      {
2211        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2212                                                            "enable sting integration and contain a constructor with a parameter that contains a parameterized type" ),
2213                                      parameter );
2214      }
2215    }
2216  }
2217
2218  private void ensureNoFieldInjections( @Nonnull final List<VariableElement> fields )
2219  {
2220    for ( final VariableElement field : fields )
2221    {
2222      if ( hasInjectAnnotation( field ) )
2223      {
2224        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2225                                                            "contain fields annotated by the " +
2226                                                            Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME +
2227                                                            " annotation. Use constructor injection instead" ),
2228                                      field );
2229      }
2230    }
2231  }
2232
2233  private void ensureNoMethodInjections( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
2234  {
2235    final List<ExecutableElement> methods =
2236      ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() );
2237    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2238    {
2239      if ( hasInjectAnnotation( method ) )
2240      {
2241        throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.mustNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2242                                                            "contain methods annotated by the " +
2243                                                            Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME +
2244                                                            " annotation. Use constructor injection instead" ),
2245                                      method );
2246      }
2247    }
2248  }
2249
2250  private void analyzeCandidateMethods( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor,
2251                                        @Nonnull final List<ExecutableElement> methods,
2252                                        @Nonnull final Types typeUtils )
2253    throws ProcessorException
2254  {
2255    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2256    {
2257      final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
2258      if ( AREZ_SPECIAL_METHODS.contains( methodName ) && method.getParameters().isEmpty() )
2259      {
2260        throw new ProcessorException( "Method defined on a class annotated by @ArezComponent uses a name " +
2261                                      "reserved by Arez", method );
2262      }
2263      else if ( methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2264                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.OBSERVABLE_DATA_FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2265                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.REFERENCE_FIELD_PREFIX ) ||
2266                methodName.startsWith( ComponentGenerator.FRAMEWORK_PREFIX ) )
2267      {
2268        throw new ProcessorException( "Method defined on a class annotated by @ArezComponent uses a name " +
2269                                      "with a prefix reserved by Arez", method );
2270      }
2271    }
2272    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> getters = new HashMap<>();
2273    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> setters = new HashMap<>();
2274    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> observes = new HashMap<>();
2275    final Map<String, CandidateMethod> onDepsChanges = new HashMap<>();
2276    for ( final ExecutableElement method : methods )
2277    {
2278      final ExecutableType methodType =
2279        (ExecutableType) typeUtils.asMemberOf( (DeclaredType) componentDescriptor.getElement().asType(), method );
2280      if ( !analyzeMethod( componentDescriptor, method, methodType ) )
2281      {
2282        /*
2283         * If we get here the method was not annotated so we can try to detect if it is a
2284         * candidate arez method in case some arez annotations are implied via naming conventions.
2285         */
2286        if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) )
2287        {
2288          continue;
2289        }
2290
2291        final CandidateMethod candidateMethod = new CandidateMethod( method, methodType );
2292        final boolean voidReturn = method.getReturnType().getKind() == TypeKind.VOID;
2293        final int parameterCount = method.getParameters().size();
2294        String name;
2295
2296        if ( !method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) )
2297        {
2298          name = deriveName( method, SETTER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2299          if ( voidReturn && 1 == parameterCount && null != name )
2300          {
2301            setters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2302            continue;
2303          }
2304          name = deriveName( method, ISSER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2305          if ( !voidReturn && 0 == parameterCount && null != name )
2306          {
2307            getters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2308            continue;
2309          }
2310          name = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2311          if ( !voidReturn && 0 == parameterCount && null != name )
2312          {
2313            getters.put( name, candidateMethod );
2314            continue;
2315          }
2316        }
2317        name = deriveName( method, ON_DEPS_CHANGE_PATTERN, Constants.SENTINEL );
2318        if ( voidReturn && null != name )
2319        {
2320          if ( 0 == parameterCount ||
2321               (
2322                 1 == parameterCount &&
2323                 Constants.OBSERVER_CLASSNAME.equals( method.getParameters().get( 0 ).asType().toString() )
2324               )
2325          )
2326          {
2327            onDepsChanges.put( name, candidateMethod );
2328            continue;
2329          }
2330        }
2331
2332        final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
2333        if ( !OBJECT_METHODS.contains( methodName ) )
2334        {
2335          observes.put( methodName, candidateMethod );
2336        }
2337      }
2338    }
2339
2340    linkUnAnnotatedObservables( componentDescriptor, getters, setters );
2341    linkUnAnnotatedObserves( componentDescriptor, observes, onDepsChanges );
2342    linkObserverRefs( componentDescriptor );
2343    linkCascadeDisposeObservables( componentDescriptor );
2344    linkCascadeDisposeReferences( componentDescriptor );
2345
2346    // CascadeDispose returned false but it was actually processed so lets remove them from getters set
2347
2348    componentDescriptor.getCascadeDisposes().keySet().forEach( method -> {
2349      for ( final Map.Entry<String, CandidateMethod> entry : new HashMap<>( getters ).entrySet() )
2350      {
2351        if ( method.equals( entry.getValue().getMethod() ) )
2352        {
2353          getters.remove( entry.getKey() );
2354        }
2355      }
2356    } );
2357
2358    linkDependencies( componentDescriptor, getters.values() );
2359
2360    autodetectObservableInitializers( componentDescriptor );
2361
2362    /*
2363     * All of the maps will have called remove() for all matching candidates.
2364     * Thus any left are the non-arez methods.
2365     */
2366
2367    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, getters.values() );
2368    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, setters.values() );
2369    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, observes.values() );
2370    ensureNoAbstractMethods( componentDescriptor, onDepsChanges.values() );
2371
2372    processCascadeDisposeFields( componentDescriptor );
2373    processComponentDependencyFields( componentDescriptor );
2374  }
2375
2376  private void ensureNoAbstractMethods( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor componentDescriptor,
2377                                        @Nonnull final Collection<CandidateMethod> candidateMethods )
2378  {
2379    candidateMethods
2380      .stream()
2381      .map( CandidateMethod::getMethod )
2382      .filter( m -> m.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.ABSTRACT ) )
2383      .forEach( m -> {
2384        throw new ProcessorException( "@ArezComponent target has an abstract method not implemented by " +
2385                                      "framework. The method is named " + m.getSimpleName(),
2386                                      componentDescriptor.getElement() );
2387      } );
2388  }
2389
2390  private boolean analyzeMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2391                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
2392                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
2393    throws ProcessorException
2394  {
2395    emitWarningForUnnecessaryProtectedMethod( descriptor, method );
2396    emitWarningForUnnecessaryFinalMethod( descriptor, method );
2397    verifyNoDuplicateAnnotations( method );
2398
2399    final AnnotationMirror action =
2400      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME );
2401    final AnnotationMirror jaxWsAction =
2402      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.JAX_WS_ACTION_CLASSNAME );
2403    final AnnotationMirror observed =
2404      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVE_CLASSNAME );
2405    final AnnotationMirror observable =
2406      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVABLE_CLASSNAME );
2407    final AnnotationMirror observableValueRef =
2408      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2409    final AnnotationMirror memoize =
2410      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.MEMOIZE_CLASSNAME );
2411    final AnnotationMirror computableValueRef =
2412      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPUTABLE_VALUE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2413    final AnnotationMirror contextRef =
2414      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.CONTEXT_REF_CLASSNAME );
2415    final AnnotationMirror stateRef =
2416      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_STATE_REF_CLASSNAME );
2417    final AnnotationMirror componentRef =
2418      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_REF_CLASSNAME );
2419    final AnnotationMirror componentId =
2420      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_ID_CLASSNAME );
2421    final AnnotationMirror componentIdRef =
2422      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_ID_REF_CLASSNAME );
2423    final AnnotationMirror componentTypeName =
2424      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_TYPE_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME );
2425    final AnnotationMirror componentNameRef =
2426      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_NAME_REF_CLASSNAME );
2427    final AnnotationMirror postConstruct =
2428      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME );
2429    final AnnotationMirror ejbPostConstruct =
2430      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.EJB_POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME );
2431    final AnnotationMirror preDispose =
2432      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.PRE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2433    final AnnotationMirror postDispose =
2434      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2435    final AnnotationMirror onActivate =
2436      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_ACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
2437    final AnnotationMirror onDeactivate =
2438      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_DEACTIVATE_CLASSNAME );
2439    final AnnotationMirror onDepsChange =
2440      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.ON_DEPS_CHANGE_CLASSNAME );
2441    final AnnotationMirror observerRef =
2442      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.OBSERVER_REF_CLASSNAME );
2443    final AnnotationMirror dependency =
2444      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME );
2445    final AnnotationMirror reference =
2446      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME );
2447    final AnnotationMirror referenceId =
2448      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME );
2449    final AnnotationMirror inverse =
2450      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
2451    final AnnotationMirror preInverseRemove =
2452      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME );
2453    final AnnotationMirror postInverseAdd =
2454      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME );
2455    final AnnotationMirror cascadeDispose =
2456      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( method, Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME );
2457
2458    if ( null != observable )
2459    {
2460      final ObservableDescriptor observableDescriptor = addObservable( descriptor,
2461                                                                       observable, method, methodType );
2462      if ( null != referenceId )
2463      {
2464        addReferenceId( descriptor, referenceId, observableDescriptor, method );
2465      }
2466      if ( null != inverse )
2467      {
2468        addInverse( descriptor, inverse, observableDescriptor, method );
2469      }
2470      if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2471      {
2472        addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, observableDescriptor );
2473      }
2474      return true;
2475    }
2476    else if ( null != observableValueRef )
2477    {
2478      addObservableValueRef( descriptor, observableValueRef, method, methodType );
2479      return true;
2480    }
2481    else if ( null != action )
2482    {
2483      if ( null != postConstruct )
2484      {
2485        addPostConstruct( descriptor, method );
2486      }
2487      addAction( descriptor, action, method, methodType );
2488      return true;
2489    }
2490    else if ( null != observed )
2491    {
2492      addObserve( descriptor, observed, method, methodType );
2493      return true;
2494    }
2495    else if ( null != onDepsChange )
2496    {
2497      addOnDepsChange( descriptor, onDepsChange, method );
2498      return true;
2499    }
2500    else if ( null != observerRef )
2501    {
2502      addObserverRef( descriptor, observerRef, method, methodType );
2503      return true;
2504    }
2505    else if ( null != contextRef )
2506    {
2507      addContextRef( descriptor, method );
2508      return true;
2509    }
2510    else if ( null != stateRef )
2511    {
2512      addComponentStateRef( descriptor, stateRef, method );
2513      return true;
2514    }
2515    else if ( null != memoize )
2516    {
2517      addMemoize( descriptor, memoize, method, methodType );
2518      return true;
2519    }
2520    else if ( null != computableValueRef )
2521    {
2522      addComputableValueRef( descriptor, computableValueRef, method, methodType );
2523      return true;
2524    }
2525    else if ( null != reference )
2526    {
2527      if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2528      {
2529        addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, null );
2530      }
2531      addReference( descriptor, reference, method, methodType );
2532      return true;
2533    }
2534    else if ( null != cascadeDispose )
2535    {
2536      addCascadeDisposeMethod( descriptor, method, null );
2537      // Return false so that it can be picked as the getter of an @Observable or linked to a @Reference
2538      return false;
2539    }
2540    else if ( null != componentIdRef )
2541    {
2542      addComponentIdRef( descriptor, method );
2543      return true;
2544    }
2545    else if ( null != componentRef )
2546    {
2547      addComponentRef( descriptor, method );
2548      return true;
2549    }
2550    else if ( null != componentId )
2551    {
2552      setComponentId( descriptor, method, methodType );
2553      return true;
2554    }
2555    else if ( null != componentNameRef )
2556    {
2557      addComponentNameRef( descriptor, method );
2558      return true;
2559    }
2560    else if ( null != componentTypeName )
2561    {
2562      setComponentTypeNameRef( descriptor, method );
2563      return true;
2564    }
2565    else if ( null != jaxWsAction )
2566    {
2567      throw new ProcessorException( "@" + Constants.JAX_WS_ACTION_CLASSNAME + " annotation " +
2568                                    "not supported in components annotated with @ArezComponent, use the @" +
2569                                    Constants.ACTION_CLASSNAME + " annotation instead.",
2570                                    method );
2571    }
2572    else if ( null != ejbPostConstruct )
2573    {
2574      throw new ProcessorException( "@" + Constants.EJB_POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME + " annotation " +
2575                                    "not supported in components annotated with @ArezComponent, use the @" +
2576                                    Constants.POST_CONSTRUCT_CLASSNAME + " annotation instead.",
2577                                    method );
2578    }
2579    else if ( null != postConstruct )
2580    {
2581      addPostConstruct( descriptor, method );
2582      return true;
2583    }
2584    else if ( null != preDispose )
2585    {
2586      addPreDispose( descriptor, method );
2587      return true;
2588    }
2589    else if ( null != postDispose )
2590    {
2591      addPostDispose( descriptor, method );
2592      return true;
2593    }
2594    else if ( null != onActivate )
2595    {
2596      addOnActivate( descriptor, onActivate, method );
2597      return true;
2598    }
2599    else if ( null != onDeactivate )
2600    {
2601      addOnDeactivate( descriptor, onDeactivate, method );
2602      return true;
2603    }
2604    else if ( null != dependency )
2605    {
2606      descriptor.addDependency( createMethodDependencyDescriptor( descriptor, method ) );
2607      return false;
2608    }
2609    else if ( null != referenceId )
2610    {
2611      addReferenceId( descriptor, referenceId, method );
2612      return true;
2613    }
2614    else if ( null != inverse )
2615    {
2616      addInverse( descriptor, inverse, method, methodType );
2617      return true;
2618    }
2619    else if ( null != preInverseRemove )
2620    {
2621      addPreInverseRemove( descriptor, preInverseRemove, method );
2622      return true;
2623    }
2624    else if ( null != postInverseAdd )
2625    {
2626      addPostInverseAdd( descriptor, postInverseAdd, method );
2627      return true;
2628    }
2629    else
2630    {
2631      return false;
2632    }
2633  }
2634
2635  private void emitWarningForUnnecessaryProtectedMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2636                                                         @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2637  {
2638    if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED ) &&
2639         Objects.equals( method.getEnclosingElement(), descriptor.getElement() ) &&
2640         ElementsUtil.isWarningNotSuppressed( method,
2641                                              Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_METHOD,
2642                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) &&
2643         !isMethodAProtectedOverride( descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
2644    {
2645      final String message =
2646        MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2647                                "declare a protected method. " +
2648                                MemberChecks.suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_PROTECTED_METHOD,
2649                                                           Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) );
2650      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, message, method );
2651    }
2652  }
2653
2654  private void emitWarningForUnnecessaryFinalMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2655                                                     @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2656  {
2657    if ( method.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.FINAL ) &&
2658         Objects.equals( method.getEnclosingElement(), descriptor.getElement() ) &&
2659         ElementsUtil.isWarningNotSuppressed( method,
2660                                              Constants.WARNING_FINAL_METHOD,
2661                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) )
2662    {
2663      final String message =
2664        MemberChecks.shouldNot( Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2665                                "declare a final method. " +
2666                                MemberChecks.suppressedBy( Constants.WARNING_FINAL_METHOD,
2667                                                           Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME ) );
2668      processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( Diagnostic.Kind.WARNING, message, method );
2669    }
2670  }
2671
2672  private void addReferenceId( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2673                               @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2674                               @Nonnull final ObservableDescriptor observable,
2675                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2676  {
2677    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2678    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2679                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2680                                         Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME,
2681                                         method );
2682    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2683    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2684
2685    final String name = getReferenceIdName( annotation, method );
2686    descriptor.findOrCreateReference( name ).setObservable( observable );
2687  }
2688
2689  private void addReferenceId( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2690                               @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2691                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2692  {
2693    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2694    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2695                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2696                                         Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME,
2697                                         method );
2698    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2699    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME, method );
2700
2701    final String name = getReferenceIdName( annotation, method );
2702    descriptor.findOrCreateReference( name ).setIdMethod( method );
2703  }
2704
2705  @Nonnull
2706  private String getReferenceIdName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2707                                     @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2708  {
2709    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2710    final String name;
2711    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
2712    {
2713      final String candidate = deriveName( method, ID_GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
2714      if ( null == candidate )
2715      {
2716        final String candidate2 = deriveName( method, RAW_ID_GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
2717        if ( null == candidate2 )
2718        {
2719          throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
2720                                        "the convention \"get[Name]Id\" or \"[name]Id\"", method );
2721        }
2722        else
2723        {
2724          name = candidate2;
2725        }
2726      }
2727      else
2728      {
2729        name = candidate;
2730      }
2731    }
2732    else
2733    {
2734      name = declaredName;
2735      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2736      {
2737        throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2738                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
2739      }
2740      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2741      {
2742        throw new ProcessorException( "@ReferenceId target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2743                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
2744      }
2745    }
2746    return name;
2747  }
2748
2749  private void addPreInverseRemove( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
2750                                    @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2751                                    @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2752    throws ProcessorException
2753  {
2754    mustBeHookHook( component.getElement(),
2755                    Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME,
2756                    method );
2757    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
2758                                component,
2759                                method,
2760                                Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME );
2761    if ( 1 != method.getParameters().size() )
2762    {
2763      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.must( Constants.PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_CLASSNAME,
2764                                                       "have exactly 1 parameter" ), method );
2765    }
2766
2767    final String name = getPreInverseRemoveName( annotation, method );
2768    findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( component, name ).addPreInverseRemoveHook( method );
2769  }
2770
2771  @Nonnull
2772  private String getPreInverseRemoveName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2773                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2774  {
2775    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2776    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
2777    {
2778      final String candidate = deriveName( method, PRE_INVERSE_REMOVE_PATTERN, name );
2779      if ( null == candidate )
2780      {
2781        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
2782                                      "the convention \"pre[Name]Remove\"", method );
2783      }
2784      else
2785      {
2786        return candidate;
2787      }
2788    }
2789    else
2790    {
2791      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2792      {
2793        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2794                                      "name must be a valid java identifier", method );
2795      }
2796      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2797      {
2798        throw new ProcessorException( "@PreInverseRemove target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2799                                      "name must not be a java keyword", method );
2800      }
2801      return name;
2802    }
2803  }
2804
2805  private void addPostInverseAdd( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor component,
2806                                  @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2807                                  @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2808    throws ProcessorException
2809  {
2810    mustBeHookHook( component.getElement(),
2811                    Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME,
2812                    method );
2813    shouldBeInternalHookMethod( processingEnv,
2814                                component,
2815                                method,
2816                                Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME );
2817    if ( 1 != method.getParameters().size() )
2818    {
2819      throw new ProcessorException( MemberChecks.must( Constants.POST_INVERSE_ADD_CLASSNAME,
2820                                                       "have exactly 1 parameter" ), method );
2821    }
2822    final String name = getPostInverseAddName( annotation, method );
2823    findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( component, name ).addPostInverseAddHook( method );
2824  }
2825
2826  @Nonnull
2827  private String getPostInverseAddName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2828                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2829  {
2830    final String name = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2831    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
2832    {
2833      final String candidate = deriveName( method, POST_INVERSE_ADD_PATTERN, name );
2834      if ( null == candidate )
2835      {
2836        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target has not specified a name and does not follow " +
2837                                      "the convention \"post[Name]Add\"", method );
2838      }
2839      else
2840      {
2841        return candidate;
2842      }
2843    }
2844    else
2845    {
2846      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2847      {
2848        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2849                                      "name must be a valid java identifier", method );
2850      }
2851      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2852      {
2853        throw new ProcessorException( "@PostInverseAdd target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2854                                      "name must not be a java keyword", method );
2855      }
2856      return name;
2857    }
2858  }
2859
2860  private void addInverse( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2861                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2862                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
2863                           @Nonnull final ExecutableType methodType )
2864  {
2865    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2866    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2867                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2868                                         Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME,
2869                                         method );
2870    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2871    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2872    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2873
2874    final String name = getInverseName( annotation, method );
2875    final ObservableDescriptor observable = descriptor.findOrCreateObservable( name );
2876    observable.setGetter( method, methodType );
2877
2878    addInverse( descriptor, annotation, observable, method );
2879  }
2880
2881  private void addInverse( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2882                           @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2883                           @Nonnull final ObservableDescriptor observable,
2884                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2885  {
2886    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2887    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( descriptor.getElement(),
2888                                         Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
2889                                         Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME,
2890                                         method );
2891    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2892    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2893    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME, method );
2894
2895    final String name = getInverseName( annotation, method );
2896    final InverseDescriptor existing = descriptor.getInverses().get( name );
2897    if ( null != existing && existing.hasObservable() )
2898    {
2899      throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target defines duplicate inverse for name '" + name +
2900                                    "'. The other inverse is " + existing.getObservable().getGetter(),
2901                                    method );
2902    }
2903    else
2904    {
2905      final TypeMirror type = method.getReturnType();
2906
2907      final Multiplicity multiplicity;
2908      TypeElement targetType = getInverseManyTypeTarget( method );
2909      if ( null != targetType )
2910      {
2911        multiplicity = Multiplicity.MANY;
2912      }
2913      else
2914      {
2915        if ( !( type instanceof DeclaredType ) ||
2916             !AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( ( (DeclaredType) type ).asElement(),
2917                                                   Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) )
2918        {
2919          throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to return a type annotated with " +
2920                                        Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, method );
2921        }
2922        targetType = (TypeElement) ( (DeclaredType) type ).asElement();
2923        if ( AnnotationsUtil.hasNonnullAnnotation( method ) )
2924        {
2925          multiplicity = Multiplicity.ONE;
2926        }
2927        else if ( AnnotationsUtil.hasNullableAnnotation( method ) )
2928        {
2929          multiplicity = Multiplicity.ZERO_OR_ONE;
2930        }
2931        else
2932        {
2933          throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target expected to be annotated with either " +
2934                                        AnnotationsUtil.NULLABLE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
2935                                        AnnotationsUtil.NONNULL_CLASSNAME, method );
2936        }
2937      }
2938      final String referenceName = getInverseReferenceNameParameter( descriptor, method );
2939
2940      final InverseDescriptor inverse = findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( descriptor, name );
2941      final String otherName = firstCharacterToLowerCase( targetType.getSimpleName().toString() );
2942      inverse.setInverse( observable, referenceName, multiplicity, targetType, otherName );
2943      verifyMultiplicityOfAssociatedReferenceMethod( descriptor, inverse );
2944    }
2945  }
2946
2947  @Nonnull
2948  private InverseDescriptor findOrCreateInverseDescriptor( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2949                                                           @Nonnull final String name )
2950  {
2951    return descriptor.getInverses().computeIfAbsent( name, n -> new InverseDescriptor( descriptor, name ) );
2952  }
2953
2954  @Nonnull
2955  private String getInverseName( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
2956                                 @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
2957  {
2958    final String declaredName = AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, "name" );
2959    final String name;
2960    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( declaredName ) )
2961    {
2962      final String candidate = deriveName( method, GETTER_PATTERN, declaredName );
2963      name = null == candidate ? method.getSimpleName().toString() : candidate;
2964    }
2965    else
2966    {
2967      name = declaredName;
2968      if ( !SourceVersion.isIdentifier( name ) )
2969      {
2970        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2971                                      "name must be a valid java identifier.", method );
2972      }
2973      else if ( SourceVersion.isKeyword( name ) )
2974      {
2975        throw new ProcessorException( "@Inverse target specified an invalid name '" + name + "'. The " +
2976                                      "name must not be a java keyword.", method );
2977      }
2978    }
2979    return name;
2980  }
2981
2982  private void warnOnUnmanagedComponentReferences( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
2983                                                   @Nonnull final List<VariableElement> fields )
2984  {
2985    final TypeElement disposeNotifier = getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSE_NOTIFIER_CLASSNAME );
2986
2987    final Set<String> injectedTypes = new HashSet<>();
2988    if ( descriptor.isStingEnabled() )
2989    {
2990      for ( final ExecutableElement constructor : ElementsUtil.getConstructors( descriptor.getElement() ) )
2991      {
2992        final List<? extends VariableElement> parameters = constructor.getParameters();
2993        for ( final VariableElement parameter : parameters )
2994        {
2995          final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( parameter.asType(), disposeNotifier );
2996          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
2997            !isDisposeNotifier && isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( parameter );
2998          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
2999            !isDisposeNotifier &&
3000            !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3001            isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( parameter );
3002          if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3003          {
3004            injectedTypes.add( parameter.asType().toString() );
3005          }
3006        }
3007      }
3008    }
3009
3010    for ( final VariableElement field : fields )
3011    {
3012      if ( !field.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.STATIC ) &&
3013           SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, field ) )
3014      {
3015        final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( field.asType(), disposeNotifier );
3016        final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
3017          !isDisposeNotifier && isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( field );
3018        final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
3019          !isDisposeNotifier &&
3020          !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3021          isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( field );
3022        if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3023        {
3024          if ( !descriptor.isDependencyDefined( field ) &&
3025               !descriptor.isCascadeDisposeDefined( field ) &&
3026               ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent || verifyReferencesToComponent( field ) ) &&
3027               isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( field ) &&
3028               !injectedTypes.contains( field.asType().toString() ) )
3029          {
3030            final String label =
3031              isDisposeNotifier ? "an implementation of DisposeNotifier" :
3032              isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation ? "an Arez component" :
3033              "annotated with @ActAsComponent";
3034            final String message =
3035              "Field named '" + field.getSimpleName().toString() + "' has a type that is " + label +
3036              " but is not annotated with @" + Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
3037              "@" + Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME + " and was not injected into the " +
3038              "constructor. This scenario can cause errors if the value is disposed. Please " +
3039              "annotate the field as appropriate or suppress the warning by annotating the field with " +
3040              "@SuppressWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" ) or " +
3041              "@SuppressArezWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" )";
3042            processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, field );
3043          }
3044        }
3045      }
3046    }
3047
3048    for ( final ObservableDescriptor observable : descriptor.getObservables().values() )
3049    {
3050      if ( observable.isAbstract() )
3051      {
3052        final ExecutableElement getter = observable.getGetter();
3053        if ( SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, getter ) )
3054        {
3055          final TypeMirror returnType = getter.getReturnType();
3056          final Element returnElement = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( returnType );
3057          final boolean isDisposeNotifier = isAssignable( returnType, disposeNotifier );
3058          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation =
3059            !isDisposeNotifier && isElementAnnotatedBy( returnElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3060          final boolean isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent =
3061            !isDisposeNotifier &&
3062            !isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation &&
3063            isElementAnnotatedBy( returnElement, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3064          if ( isDisposeNotifier || isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation || isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent )
3065          {
3066            if ( !descriptor.isDependencyDefined( getter ) &&
3067                 !descriptor.isCascadeDisposeDefined( getter ) &&
3068                 ( isDisposeNotifier ||
3069                   isTypeAnnotatedActAsComponent ||
3070                   verifyReferencesToComponent( (TypeElement) returnElement ) ) &&
3071                 isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( getter ) &&
3072                 ( observable.hasSetter() && isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( observable.getSetter() ) ) )
3073            {
3074              final String label =
3075                isDisposeNotifier ? "an implementation of DisposeNotifier" :
3076                isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation ? "an Arez component" :
3077                "annotated with @ActAsComponent";
3078              final String message =
3079                "Method named '" + getter.getSimpleName().toString() + "' has a return type that is " + label +
3080                " but is not annotated with @" + Constants.CASCADE_DISPOSE_CLASSNAME + " or " +
3081                "@" + Constants.COMPONENT_DEPENDENCY_CLASSNAME + ". This scenario can cause errors. " +
3082                "Please annotate the method as appropriate or suppress the warning by annotating the method with " +
3083                "@SuppressWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" ) or " +
3084                "@SuppressArezWarnings( \"" + Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE + "\" )";
3085              processingEnv.getMessager().printMessage( WARNING, message, getter );
3086            }
3087          }
3088        }
3089      }
3090    }
3091  }
3092
3093  private boolean verifyReferencesToComponent( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3094  {
3095    return verifyReferencesToComponent( (TypeElement) processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() ) );
3096  }
3097
3098  private boolean verifyReferencesToComponent( @Nonnull final TypeElement element )
3099  {
3100    assert SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, element );
3101
3102    final String verifyReferencesToComponent =
3103      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( element,
3104                                                  Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3105                                                  "verifyReferencesToComponent" );
3106    return switch ( verifyReferencesToComponent )
3107      {
3108        case "ENABLE" -> true;
3109        case "DISABLE" -> false;
3110        default -> isDisposableTrackableRequired( element );
3111      };
3112  }
3113
3114  private boolean isUnmanagedComponentReferenceNotSuppressed( @Nonnull final Element element )
3115  {
3116    return !ElementsUtil.isWarningSuppressed( element,
3117                                              Constants.WARNING_UNMANAGED_COMPONENT_REFERENCE,
3118                                              Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3119  }
3120
3121  private boolean isTypeAnnotatedByActAsComponentAnnotation( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3122  {
3123    final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() );
3124    return isElementAnnotatedBy( element, Constants.ACT_AS_COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3125  }
3126
3127  private boolean isTypeAnnotatedByComponentAnnotation( @Nonnull final VariableElement field )
3128  {
3129    final Element element = processingEnv.getTypeUtils().asElement( field.asType() );
3130    return isElementAnnotatedBy( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME );
3131  }
3132
3133  private boolean isElementAnnotatedBy( @Nullable final Element element, @Nonnull final String annotation )
3134  {
3135    return null != element &&
3136           SuperficialValidation.validateElement( processingEnv, element ) &&
3137           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( element, annotation );
3138  }
3139
3140  private boolean isService( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3141  {
3142    final String service =
3143      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( typeElement, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, "service" );
3144    return switch ( service )
3145      {
3146        case "ENABLE" -> true;
3147        case "DISABLE" -> false;
3148        default -> AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_CONTRIBUTE_TO ) ||
3149                   AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_TYPED ) ||
3150                   AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_NAMED ) ||
3151                   AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( typeElement, Constants.STING_EAGER );
3152      };
3153  }
3154
3155  private boolean isComponentObservableRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent,
3156                                                 final boolean disposeOnDeactivate )
3157  {
3158    final VariableElement variableElement = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "observable" );
3159    return switch ( variableElement.getSimpleName().toString() )
3160      {
3161        case "ENABLE" -> true;
3162        case "DISABLE" -> false;
3163        default -> disposeOnDeactivate;
3164      };
3165  }
3166
3167  private boolean isVerifyRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent,
3168                                    @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3169  {
3170    final VariableElement parameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "verify" );
3171    return switch ( parameter.getSimpleName().toString() )
3172      {
3173        case "ENABLE" -> true;
3174        case "DISABLE" -> false;
3175        default ->
3176          ElementsUtil.getMethods( typeElement, processingEnv.getElementUtils(), processingEnv.getTypeUtils() ).
3177            stream().anyMatch( this::hasReferenceAnnotations );
3178      };
3179  }
3180
3181  private boolean hasReferenceAnnotations( @Nonnull final Element method )
3182  {
3183    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_CLASSNAME ) ||
3184           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.REFERENCE_ID_CLASSNAME ) ||
3185           AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.INVERSE_CLASSNAME );
3186  }
3187
3188  private boolean isEqualsRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3189  {
3190    final VariableElement injectParameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "requireEquals" );
3191    return "ENABLE".equals( injectParameter.getSimpleName().toString() );
3192  }
3193
3194  @Nullable
3195  private String getDefaultPriority( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3196  {
3197    final AnnotationValue value =
3198      AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationValueNoDefaults( arezComponent, "defaultPriority" );
3199    return null == value ? null : ( (VariableElement) value.getValue() ).getSimpleName().toString();
3200  }
3201
3202  private boolean isIdRequired( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror arezComponent )
3203  {
3204    final VariableElement injectParameter = getAnnotationParameter( arezComponent, "requireId" );
3205    return !"DISABLE".equals( injectParameter.getSimpleName().toString() );
3206  }
3207
3208  private boolean hasInjectAnnotation( @Nonnull final Element method )
3209  {
3210    return AnnotationsUtil.hasAnnotationOfType( method, Constants.INJECT_CLASSNAME );
3211  }
3212
3213  @Nonnull
3214  private <T> T getAnnotationParameter( @Nonnull final AnnotationMirror annotation,
3215                                        @Nonnull final String parameterName )
3216  {
3217    return AnnotationsUtil.getAnnotationValueValue( annotation, parameterName );
3218  }
3219
3220  @Nonnull
3221  private TypeElement getDisposableTypeElement()
3222  {
3223    return getTypeElement( Constants.DISPOSABLE_CLASSNAME );
3224  }
3225
3226  private boolean isDisposableTrackableRequired( @Nonnull final TypeElement element )
3227  {
3228    final String disposeNotifier =
3229      AnnotationsUtil.getEnumAnnotationParameter( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, "disposeNotifier" );
3230    return switch ( disposeNotifier )
3231      {
3232        case "ENABLE" -> true;
3233        case "DISABLE" -> false;
3234        default -> null == AnnotationsUtil.findAnnotationByType( element, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME ) ||
3235                   !isService( element );
3236      };
3237  }
