3239  @Nonnull
3240  private TypeElement getTypeElement( @Nonnull final String classname )
3241  {
3242    final TypeElement typeElement = findTypeElement( classname );
3243    assert null != typeElement;
3244    return typeElement;
3245  }
3246
3247  @Nullable
3248  private TypeElement findTypeElement( @Nonnull final String classname )
3249  {
3250    return processingEnv.getElementUtils().getTypeElement( classname );
3251  }
3252
3253  private boolean isAssignable( @Nonnull final TypeMirror type, @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement )
3254  {
3255    return processingEnv.getTypeUtils().isAssignable( type, typeElement.asType() );
3256  }
3257
3258  private boolean isMethodAProtectedOverride( @Nonnull final TypeElement typeElement,
3259                                              @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3260  {
3261    final ExecutableElement overriddenMethod = ElementsUtil.getOverriddenMethod( processingEnv, typeElement, method );
3262    return null != overriddenMethod && overriddenMethod.getModifiers().contains( Modifier.PROTECTED );
3263  }
3264
3265  private void mustBeStandardRefMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3266                                        @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3267                                        @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3268                                        @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3269  {
3270    mustBeRefMethod( descriptor, method, annotationClassname );
3271    MemberChecks.mustNotHaveAnyParameters( annotationClassname, method );
3272    shouldBeInternalRefMethod( processingEnv, descriptor, method, annotationClassname );
3273  }
3274
3275  private void mustBeRefMethod( @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3276                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3277                                @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3278  {
3279    MemberChecks.mustBeAbstract( annotationClassname, method );
3280    final TypeElement typeElement = descriptor.getElement();
3281    MemberChecks.mustNotBePackageAccessInDifferentPackage( typeElement,
3282                                                           Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME,
3283                                                           annotationClassname,
3284                                                           method );
3285    MemberChecks.mustReturnAValue( annotationClassname, method );
3286    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( annotationClassname, method );
3287  }
3288
3289  private void mustBeHookHook( @Nonnull final TypeElement targetType,
3290                               @Nonnull final String annotationName,
3291                               @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method )
3292    throws ProcessorException
3293  {
3294    MemberChecks.mustNotBeAbstract( annotationName, method );
3295    MemberChecks.mustBeSubclassCallable( targetType, Constants.COMPONENT_CLASSNAME, annotationName, method );
3296    MemberChecks.mustNotReturnAnyValue( annotationName, method );
3297    MemberChecks.mustNotThrowAnyExceptions( annotationName, method );
3298  }
3299
3300  private void shouldBeInternalRefMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3301                                          @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3302                                          @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3303                                          @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3304  {
3305    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3306    {
3307      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3308                                      method,
3309                                      annotationClassname,
3310                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_REF_METHOD,
3311                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3312    }
3313  }
3314
3315  private void shouldBeInternalLifecycleMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3316                                                @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3317                                                @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3318                                                @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3319  {
3320    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3321    {
3322      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3323                                      method,
3324                                      annotationClassname,
3325                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_LIFECYCLE_METHOD,
3326                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3327    }
3328  }
3329
3330  private void shouldBeInternalHookMethod( @Nonnull final ProcessingEnvironment processingEnv,
3331                                           @Nonnull final ComponentDescriptor descriptor,
3332                                           @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3333                                           @Nonnull final String annotationClassname )
3334  {
3335    if ( MemberChecks.doesMethodNotOverrideInterfaceMethod( processingEnv, descriptor.getElement(), method ) )
3336    {
3337      MemberChecks.shouldNotBePublic( processingEnv,
3338                                      method,
3339                                      annotationClassname,
3340                                      Constants.WARNING_PUBLIC_HOOK_METHOD,
3341                                      Constants.SUPPRESS_AREZ_WARNINGS_CLASSNAME );
3342    }
3343  }
3344
3345  @Nullable
3346  private String deriveName( @Nonnull final ExecutableElement method,
3347                             @Nonnull final Pattern pattern,
3348                             @Nonnull final String name )
3349    throws ProcessorException
3350  {
3351    if ( Constants.SENTINEL.equals( name ) )
3352    {
3353      final String methodName = method.getSimpleName().toString();
3354      final Matcher matcher = pattern.matcher( methodName );
3355      if ( matcher.find() )
3356      {
3357        final String candidate = matcher.group( 1 );
3358        return firstCharacterToLowerCase( candidate );
3359      }
3360      else
3361      {
3362        return null;
3363      }
3364    }
3365    else
3366    {
3367      return name;
3368    }
3369  }
3370
3371  @Nonnull
3372  private String firstCharacterToLowerCase( @Nonnull final String name )
3373  {
3374    return Character.toLowerCase( name.charAt( 0 ) ) + name.substring( 1 );
3375  }
3376}
